MsgJp:
ネド王子と解放軍が合流したんだ
敵の警戒も厳しくなるだろうね
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo and the liberation army have joined
forces. Enemy vigilance will also intensify, I
suppose.

MsgJp:
ネド王子はたしかにまだ子供だけど
聞く限り、無茶はしない印象だよ
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo is certainly still a child, but from
what I hear, he gives the impression of not doing
anything reckless.

MsgJp:
フィンダムで起こったことを記録して
後世に残そうと思っているんだけど――
MsgEn:
I want to record what happened in Phindym and
leave it for future generations to see—

MsgJp:
フィンダムを竜力が巡る仕組みは
こっちとは少し違うようだね
MsgEn:
The mechanism of Dragon Force circulating around
Phindym seems to be a little different from here.

MsgJp:
メイリーフを連れ出したフードの女って
やっぱり彼女だよな――
MsgEn:
The woman in the hood who took Mayleaf out... I
knew it was her.

MsgJp:
レオが匿っているという人と話せれば
もっと色々と分かるのだろうけど
今はそれよりも侵食魔退治だね
まったく、次から次へと――
MsgEn:
If I could talk to the person Leo is hiding with,
I would probably understand more. But right now,
it's more about defeating the Corruption.
Seriously, it's one thing after another—

MsgJp:
レスタニアの命運は尽きる寸前だった――
あはは――今になって脚が震えるよ
MsgEn:
Lestania's fate was on the brink of
exhaustion—Ahaha—My legs are trembling now.

MsgJp:
レスタニアは平和なものさ
気分転換に散歩でもどうだい？
MsgEn:
Lestania is a peaceful place. How about taking a
walk for a change of mood?

MsgJp:
レスタニア中の海図がこの神殿に
集まることになっているんだ
船乗りたちと一緒に、その海図とにらめっこさ
MsgEn:
The charts of all of Lestania are to be gathered
here in this temple. I'll be poring over them with
the sailors.

MsgJp:
ロイグが早くよくなることを祈るよ
まあ、ロイグのためというよりは
かなり利己的な理由だけどね
MsgEn:
I hope Loeg gets better soon. Well, it's not so
much for Loeg's sake but rather for quite selfish
reasons.

MsgJp:
ロイグはガラダ族長たちのことを
快く思っていなかった
いや、逆恨みしていたという感じかな？
MsgEn:
Loeg did not have a favorable opinion of the
Gearóid tribal leaders. No, it's more like he held
a grudge against them, I guess?

MsgJp:
不安と期待が入り交じるこの気持ち――
説明が難しいね
MsgEn:
This feeling of mixed anxiety and
anticipation—It's hard to explain.

MsgJp:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
MsgEn:
Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's
not surprising no matter what he says.

MsgJp:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
MsgEn:
Joseph is currently a bundle of suspicion. It's
not surprising no matter what he says.

MsgJp:
今は解放軍と一緒に王都奪回の戦いに
専念するのがいいと思うよ
MsgEn:
I think it's best to focus on the battle to
recapture the Royal Capital with the Liberation
Army.

MsgJp:
今度の調査だって僕が行けば前回との
比較ができたのに――
意見も全然聞いてもらえないし――はぁ
MsgEn:
If I were to go on this investigation, I would
have been able to compare it to the last time—but
I don't get listened to at all—sigh.

MsgJp:
今朝、ぶつけて爪が欠けてしまってね
嫌な予感がするんだ
MsgEn:
I bumped it this morning and chipped a nail. I
have a bad feeling about this.

MsgJp:
他の人も思いは同じだと思うよ
つまり――
僕が言いたいのは、レオの後任は大変だけど
頑張ってくれってことさ
MsgEn:
I think other people feel the same way. In other
words— What I want to say is, it's tough to be
Leo's successor, but I hope you will do your best.

MsgJp:
会議だなんて――
これは時間がかかるよ
MsgEn: A meeting? Oh, this is going to take some time.

MsgJp:
例の島をね、もっとよく調べようと思うんだ
戦いは一段落ついたのかもしれないけど
調査は何も終わってないからね
MsgEn:
I think I'll continue to investigate that island
more thoroughly. Although the fighting may have
come to a halt, the investigation is far from
over.

MsgJp:
僕のことはジョゼフ様が一番よく知っている
はずなのに――
MsgEn:
You know me better than anyone, Joseph. I should
have known...

MsgJp:
僕はね――もう後悔はしたくない
予兆には気づいていたのに――
遠慮する必要は何もなかったのに――
MsgEn:
I don't—I don't want any more regrets. I knew the
signs were there. There was no need to hesitate...

MsgJp:
僕は君たちの一歩先のことを考えるとしよう
それが僕の仕事だよね？
MsgEn:
Let's say I'm one step ahead of you guys That's
my job, right?

MsgJp:
僕は混乱の中で解決を模索するのが好きなんだ
つまり、この慌ただしさも僕の味方さ
MsgEn:
I enjoy seeking solutions in the midst of
confusion. In other words, this busyness is also
on my side.

MsgJp:
僕は確かに錬金術師の末裔さ
でも、だからなんだと言うんだろうね
MsgEn:
I am indeed a descendant of an alchemist, but so
what?

MsgJp:
僕も島に乗り込みたいと思っていたけど
まだ時期尚早のようだね
もう少し状況が落ち着くのを待つよ
MsgEn:
I also wanted to join you on the island, but it
seems it's still too early. I'll wait a little
longer for the situation to settle down.

MsgJp:
僕も調査に行きたいんだよね――
でもここで騒ぐと余計に面倒な立場に
なってしまいそうだから我慢しているんだ
MsgEn:
I want to go investigate too—but I'm holding back
because making a fuss here might put me in an even
more troublesome position.

MsgJp:
力だけで知識も経験も与えられなかったから
釣り合いが取れなくて――
いやいや、問題はそこじゃないか！
MsgEn:
They gave no knowledge, no experience, just
power. There was no balance... No, no, no, that's
not the point!

MsgJp:
反省しています――はい
ああ、君か――また叱られるのかと思ったよ
MsgEn:
I'm reflecting on it—yes. Oh, it's you—I thought
I was going to be scolded again.

MsgJp: 可能な限り、いい顔でたのむよ
MsgEn: Please do it with a smile, if possible.

MsgJp:
向こうとこっち――
立場は五分と五分――この考え方が
平和共存への道に繋がると思うんだ
MsgEn:
Over there and here, The positions are evenly
split—I believe that this way of thinking Leads to
peaceful coexistence.

MsgJp:
君たちを助けるセシリーの竜力は
あくまでも仮初めの力
そう長くは続かないと思うよ
MsgEn:
Cecily's Dragon Force, which helps you, is merely
a temporary power. I don't think it will last
long.

MsgJp:
君たち自身も希望なんだ
それを忘れないでくれ
MsgEn:
You yourselves also have hope, Please do not
forget that.

MsgJp:
君だって、不安だろう？
早いところ、行った方がいいよ
MsgEn:
You're worried, too, aren't you? You'd better get
there as soon as possible.

MsgJp:
君と雑談？
いいね！　よし、共通の話題を探そうよ
MsgEn:
Having a little chat with you? Great! Okay, let's
find something we have in common.

MsgJp:
君も協力してくれるよね？
もう結構長い付き合いだもの――
僕に野心がないことなんてわかってるだろ？
MsgEn:
You'll also help me, right? We've been together
for quite a long time, after all... You know that
I don't have any ambitions, don't you?

MsgJp:
命は白竜様の役に立ったとしても
キースヒルトが知っていた知識、知恵――
全部消えてしまった
MsgEn:
Even if the life was useful to Master White
Dragon, the knowledge, the wisdom that Kieshildt
knew—it's all gone.

MsgJp:
問題は、君とガルドリンが行ったという
島の場所だね
MsgEn:
The problem is the location of the island you and
Gurdolin say you went to.

MsgJp:
回り道はあったけど、いよいよだね
良い報告を待っているよ
MsgEn:
There was a detour, but now it's time. I'll be
waiting for good news!

MsgJp:
大海原に浮かぶ島を見つけるなんて
そう簡単じゃない
MsgEn:
It's not easy to find an island floating in the
open sea.

MsgJp:
奪回した城を拠点に力を蓄えて
“悪しき竜”の討伐を目指すのだよね？
MsgEn:
To gather strength at the recaptured castle and
aim to defeat the "Evil Dragon," right?

MsgJp:
姿を消したとなると、何か深い事情が
あるんだろうね
解決可能なことだといいけど――
MsgEn:
If he disappeared, there must have been some deep
reason behind it. I hope it's something that can
be resolved.

MsgJp:
将来の神官にふさわしいかどうか――
ノドから手が出るほど欲しい地位だったけど
今はどうかな――
MsgEn:
Whether I am suitable to be a future priest—
Although I desired the position so much that I
would give my right arm for it, I wonder now, how
about it—

MsgJp:
島が見つかってホッとしているよ
肩の荷が下りたというかね
ここだけの話――
ジョゼフ様は僕を試しているね
MsgEn:
I feel relieved that the island has been found.
It's like a burden has been lifted off my
shoulders. Just between you and me— Master Joseph
is testing me.

MsgJp:
島に現れた魔物はこれまでの侵食魔とは
かなり様子が違うとか？
MsgEn:
I hear the monsters that appeared on the island
are considerably different from the previous
Corruption?

MsgJp:
島の調査は引き続きやっているよ
いい報告ができればいいんだけど
少々魔物が多くてね
MsgEn:
We are still conducting investigations on the
island. I hope we can make a good report, but
there are quite a few monsters.

MsgJp:
嵐の中を出かけていった騎士たちには
頭が下がるよ
MsgEn:
To the knights who went out into the storm, I
salute you.

MsgJp:
常識にとらわれないこと
それが、平凡を非凡に変えるんだ
MsgEn:
Thinking outside the box. That's what transforms
ordinary into extraordinary.

MsgJp:
思い立ったら、すぐに行動！
待っていても発見は無いからね
MsgEn:
When you have an idea, act on it immediately! You
won't find anything if you wait.

MsgJp:
悔しいなあ
僕には知らないことがいっぱいある
それを思い知らされて――
ああ、悔しいよ
MsgEn:
It's frustrating. There are so many things I
don't know. Being reminded of that... Ah, it's
frustrating.

MsgJp:
悪いね
ついついレオのことを考えてしまうんだ
こんな時にどうして留守なんだってね
MsgEn:
It's bad, isn't it? I can't help but think about
Leo. Why is he absent at a time like this?

MsgJp:
早くアッカーシェランへ向かった方がいいよ
状況は王子の動き次第で変わるんだから
MsgEn:
It would be better to quickly head towards Acre
Selund; the situation can change depending on the
prince's movements.

MsgJp: 時は来た――だね
MsgEn: The time has come—right?

MsgJp: 本格的な城攻めを前にしての休暇かな？
MsgEn: Is it a vacation before a serious castle attack?

MsgJp:
次は覚者の番だね
くれぐれも、気をつけて
MsgEn: Next is the turn of the Arisen, Please be careful.

MsgJp:
気づいていたのに――
イリスは少し変わったなって
気づいていたんだ
MsgEn: I had noticed—that Iris had changed a little.

MsgJp:
浄化は始まっているんだろう？
進捗状況が気になるところだね
MsgEn:
I assume the purification has begun? I'm curious
to see the progress.

MsgJp: 火垂れ山は“悪しき竜”の住み処だよね
MsgEn:
Firefall Mountain is the dwelling place of the
"Evil Dragon," right?

MsgJp: 王子には何か目的があるのだろうけど――
MsgEn: I'm sure the prince has a purpose, but—

MsgJp:
王都の戦いが終わらないと
落ち着かないよね
MsgEn:
I can't calm down until the battle in the Royal
Capital is over.

MsgJp:
盗賊と言えば荒くれ者と相場が決まっている
本拠地に乗り込むんだから
言動には気をつけて
MsgEn:
When it comes to thieves, they are often
considered rough individuals. Since we are
infiltrating their headquarters, be careful with
your words and actions.

MsgJp:
盗賊の次はオークの本拠地だって？
君たちはそっちの方が慣れているかな
MsgEn:
Next is the orc's stronghold, huh? I wonder if
you guys are more familiar with that.

MsgJp: 空から降ってきた巨大な石碑――
MsgEn: A gigantic stone monument fell from the sky...

MsgJp:
竜と樹が循環と浄化を分け合っているというか――
竜への異存が少ないということなのかなあ
MsgEn:
I wonder if it means that the dragon and the tree
are sharing circulation and purification—or maybe
it means that there is little objection towards
the dragon.

MsgJp:
考え得る対策を書きだして
とにかく吟味する
MsgEn:
Write down all possible measures and thoroughly
scrutinize them.

MsgJp:
聞くところによると、セシリーのお父さんは
戦士でもなんでもない、普通の人らしいね
MsgEn:
According to what I've heard, Cecily's father is
not a warrior or anything, he seems to be an
ordinary person.

MsgJp: 行ったり来たり、ご苦労だね
MsgEn: Going back and forth, you've had it tough.

MsgJp:
覚悟はしていたけどね――
いやいや、挫けてなるものか！
MsgEn:
I was prepared, you know— No, no, I will not be
deterred!

MsgJp:
覚者が一緒じゃないと戻ってこられないから
君たち、その時はよろしくたのむよ
MsgEn:
I cannot return without the Arisen being present,
so I ask you all to take care of me at that time.

MsgJp: 覚者じゃないこの身が恨めしいよ
MsgEn:
This body that is not an Arisen is filled with
resentment.

MsgJp:
覚者と騎士団の反目に巻き込まれて
僕は処世術を学んだんだ
MsgEn:
I learned the art of worldly wisdom being caught
up in the conflict between the Arisen and the
knights.

MsgJp:
解放軍はここに来てずいぶん敵を
刺激したからね
反撃は覚悟しないと
MsgEn:
The Liberation Army has certainly stimulated the
enemy since they have arrived here. We must be
prepared for counterattacks.

MsgJp:
誰が与えたか――与えなかったのか――
考えるべきなのは背後にいたのは
誰かって話だよね
MsgEn:
Who gave -- or didn't give -- What we should be
thinking about is who was behind it

MsgJp:
謎の騎士の話題で持ちきりだね
正体はどうあれ、強敵に違いないから
万事準備怠りなく、だよ？
MsgEn:
The topic of the mysterious knight is all the
buzz, right? Regardless of their identity, they
are definitely a formidable opponent. So, let's
prepare ourselves for anything, okay?

MsgJp:
逐次攻略というか各個撃破というか
物事はひとつずつ解決するのが良策だと
主張する人もいるけどね――
MsgEn:
Rather than calling it a step-by-step strategy,
it's more like defeating each individual. Some
people argue that it's best to solve things one by
one, but I'm not sure that it's a good idea.

MsgJp:
道のりはまだまだありそうだから
じっくり行かないとね
MsgEn:
The journey seems to still have a long way to go,
so we must proceed carefully.

MsgJp:
適材適所って言うだろ？
そう、僕は武ではなく、知で攻めるのさ
MsgEn:
You know what they say about the right person for
the right job? Yes, I attack with wisdom, not
military prowess.

MsgJp:
頼むよ――
黒騎士の剣を取り戻して
MsgEn:
Please, I beg you—Retrieve the sword of The Black
Knight.

MsgJp:
騎士団が時々掃討作戦を展開しているから
まあ、気長にね――
ああ気長！　僕たちの苦手なやつだよね
くう――
MsgEn:
Because the Knights sometimes conduct sweeps
Well, be patient— Oh, patience! We're not very
good at that. (sigh)

MsgJp:
黒騎士と魔物の関係という観点から見ると
新手の方が、より黒騎士に近い存在という
ことかなあ
MsgEn:
From the perspective of the relationship between
the Black Knight and monsters, it could be said
that the newcomer is a presence closer to the
Black Knight.

MsgJp:
――うむ
これで各地のエリアとおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
MsgEn:
This will strengthen the connection between each
area and yourself

MsgJp:
――これで
アビリティは無事、解放されたようだぞ
MsgEn:
――It seems that the abilities have been
successfully unlocked.

MsgJp:
――これで
転移の礎は無事、解放されたようだ
MsgEn:
――With this, it seems that the Portcrystals have
been successfully unlocked.

MsgJp:
――これはすまぬ
そのジョブには《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》は
効果が無いのだ
別のジョブで考え直してみてくれ
MsgEn:
--Sorry about this
The 《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 has no
effect on that job.
Think again with a different job.

MsgJp: ――さて、この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn: Now then, should we unleash the power of this orb?

MsgJp:
――よろしい
無事、スキルが解放されたようだぞ
MsgEn:
――Alright.
It appears that the skill has been unlocked
successfully.

MsgJp:
――よろしい
無事、レベルがあがったようだぞ
MsgEn:
-- Good.
Looks like you're safe and leveled up.

MsgJp:
――気付いているだろうが
このジョブはすでにLV.80に達しているな
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
I guess you've noticed,
but this job has already reached level 80.
The effects of leveling up would be wasted,
but are you still going to use the treasure?

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が絶望の大陸と呼んだ
アッカーシェランの状況は大いに変わった
MsgEn:
The "Evil Dragon" referred to as the Land of
Despair.
The situation of Acre Selund has greatly changed.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”といい黒い騎士といい
姿を見せずに我々を翻弄するとは――
なんと卑劣な者たちだ
MsgEn:
"Evil Dragon" and the black knight, for that
matter,
To manipulate us without showing their true forms—
How despicable these individuals are.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
MsgEn:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon"
literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
MsgEn:
Can we take the words of the "Evil Dragon"
literally?
I don't know if I believe it.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の討伐が解放軍の目的とすれば
次はいかなる道を進むのか――
MsgEn:
If the goal of the Liberation Army is to defeat
the "evil dragon,"
what path will it take next?

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”め！
アッカーシェランの次はこのレスタニア――
MsgEn:
"Evil Dragon," beware!
After Acre Selund, is Lestania--

MsgJp:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn:
《<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

MsgJp:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
MsgEn:
《<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》の到着を座して待つのも
手持ちぶさただろう
さあ、フィンダムへ行って、手伝ってやりなさい
MsgEn:
However, the decision is still up to you. As much
as I can hope, I can only hope.

MsgJp:
《竜力の継承》には何の影響もないが
前途を祝して、宝珠の力を解放しておくか
力は大地を巡り、またいつの日か
おまえの元へ戻ろう
MsgEn:
While there is no effect on 《Dragon Force
Augmentation》,
In celebration of the future, should we release
the power of the jewel?
The power will revolve around the land and one
day,
it will return to you.

MsgJp: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
MsgEn: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

MsgJp: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
MsgEn: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

MsgJp:
ああ、すまない
考えごとをしていてな
MsgEn: Ah, sorry. I was lost in thought.

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgEn: No

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
いったい何故セシリーが狙われねば
ならんのだ
MsgEn: Why on earth is Cecily being targeted?

MsgJp:
いや、もちろん、歌い、食べ、大いに語るのもよい
好きにしなさい
多少のことは多めに見よう
MsgEn:
No, of course, it's good to sing, eat, and talk a
lot.
Do as you like.
Let's consider even the small things a little
more.

MsgJp:
いや、わたしだって、驚いているし
胸も痛む――
MsgEn: No, even I am surprised and my heart hurts --

MsgJp:
いやはや――
この事件を記録に残さねばならないが
MsgEn:
Well, well...
I must record this incident.

MsgJp:
いやはや――
まったく――
MsgEn:
I understand the nature of the conversation--
What you want is not just information but the
truth itself, isn't it?

MsgJp:
おかしなものだ――
エルフはメイリーフだけではないと知ってから
心の隅で安心していた部分がある――
MsgEn:
It's strange-- Ever since I discovered that there
are other elves besides Mayleaf, there has been a
sense of relief in the back of my mind.

MsgJp:
おまえが持ってきたこの宝珠
篭められた力を解放することで
より冒険がしやすくなるというものだ
MsgEn:
The Orb that you brought with you is said to make
it easier to embark on adventures by unleashing
its hidden power.

MsgJp:
おまえたちも同じだろうが、わたしの頭の中は
黒い鎧の騎士でいっぱいだ
MsgEn:
You guys are the same, right? But inside my head,
it's filled with black-clad knights.

MsgJp:
おまえたちも忙しいだろうが
気にしてみてくれ
MsgEn:
The rest is the role of the one who awakens The
White Dragon and the responsibility of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
おまえたち覚者の力こそ
我々に残された希望だ
MsgEn:
The power of you Arisen is the hope that remains
for us.

MsgJp:
おまえはけして間違えない
ああ、信じているとも
MsgEn: You will never make a mistake Ah, I believe in you

MsgJp:
おまえはすでに多くのエリアに貢献している
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
You have already contributed to many areas.
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp:
おまえも忙しくなるだろうから休める時には
休んでおくことだ
MsgEn:
You'll be busy too, so when you can take a break,
take it.

MsgJp: こうなると奴の沈黙が不気味だな
MsgEn: When it comes to this, his silence is eerie.

MsgJp:
ここに持ってきたということは
今、この宝珠の竜力を解放してもよいのか？
MsgEn:
Does bringing it here mean that I am now allowed
to unleash the Dragon Force contained within this
jewel?

MsgJp:
こちらのことは何も心配するな
それから――
フィンダムの住民と接触する時は
威厳を忘れずにな
MsgEn:
Don't forget to consider the lives of the
citizens.

MsgJp:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
there may not be any significant effect obtained.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
転移の礎に何の影響もないが
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
MsgEn:
Even if the power of this Orb is released,
it will have no effect on the Portcrystals.
Nevertheless, may I release the power of this Orb?

MsgJp:
この宝珠は自らの力で腕を磨いたおまえには
不要なものだったようだ
まさに覚者の鑑よ
MsgEn:
It seems that this orb was unnecessary for you,
who has polished your skills on your own. Truly,
you are an Arisen.

MsgJp: この期に及んでいったい何事だろうな
MsgEn: What on earth is going on at this point?

MsgJp:
この状況――
これまでの経緯を思えば王子に悪意が
あるとは思えない
MsgEn:
Given the situation ―― considering the previous
circumstances, it is hard to believe that the
prince has any ill intentions.

MsgJp:
これでこのジョブのアビリティも
特殊なもの以外は全ておまえのものとなったぞ
MsgEn:
Now all the abilities of this job
are yours, except for the special ones!

MsgJp:
これは――このまま
《<VAL>》
を使っても、開放するアビリティは無いようだぞ
それでも、今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
This... even if you use the《<VAL>》as is, it seems
there are no usable abilities. Are you going to
use the orb with your current job?

MsgJp:
これは――このまま《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、効果のあるアビリティは無いようだぞ
今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
This... even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of
Growth》 at this level, it seems there are no
abilities to be raised.
Are you going to use the orb with your current
job?

MsgJp: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
MsgEn: This is a good omen - good things are beginning.

MsgJp:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
MsgEn:
This is a jewel imbued with strong Dragon Force.
If you offer it to the White Dragon, your 《Dragon
Force Augmentation》 will become complete.

MsgJp:
これほどの嵐――
史書の編纂が始まって以来なかったことだ
後世のために、詳細な記録を
残しておかねば
MsgEn:
Such a storm―― It has never happened since the
beginning of the compilation of historical
records. For future generations, detailed records
must be kept.

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブの
スキルやアビリティを
解放することができる
MsgEn:
By using this, you will be able to unlock the
skills and abilities of your current job.

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
MsgEn:
With this, you can raise your current job to
level 80.
You can also raise the limit for skills and
abilities, except for special ones.
And of course, job points can be accumulated up
to the new limit.

MsgJp:
これを使えば、今のジョブを上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
MsgEn:
With this, you can raise your current job
and your skills and abilities to the
maximum, except for special ones.

MsgJp:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
MsgEn:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《「LV.80」Orb of Growth》 with your current job?

MsgJp:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
MsgEn:
I may be disliked again for saying this, but
there is a possibility that Acre Selund is
conspiring and trying to deceive us.

MsgJp:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
MsgEn:
You've worked hard.
Please take a rest.

MsgJp:
さあ、メルゴダへ行くんだ
向こうで誰と話――誰と戦うか
それは自分で決めればいい
MsgEn:
Now, you're going to Mergoda. Who to talk to over
there - who to fight. You should decide that for
yourself.

MsgJp:
さあ、今のうちに休んだり装備を見直したり――
いよいよ決戦だぞ
MsgEn:
Now, while you're at it, get some rest and review
your equipment-- It's time for the showdown!

MsgJp:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
MsgEn:
I have no words, nothing I can do, but pray for
your safety.

MsgJp:
さあ、行け覚者よ
白竜様の加護があらんことを――
MsgEn:
Now, go forth, Arisen
May you be blessed by the White Dragon's grace.

MsgJp:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
MsgEn:
However...
If we do not value and appreciate those who serve
us a little more,
it will be difficult to govern the country.

MsgJp:
しかし、敵に心奪われた者をこれまでどおり
信頼するわけにもいくまい
MsgEn:
However, I cannot continue to trust someone who
has been swayed by the enemy as before.

MsgJp:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
MsgEn:
However, perhaps it would be better for just you
guys to start shifting your feelings towards
defeating the dragon.

MsgJp:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
MsgEn:
For a while, please handle things flexibly and
adapt as you see fit.

MsgJp:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
MsgEn:
All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been
completed. Confirm what kind of power you have
obtained!

MsgJp:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
MsgEn:
All the 《Dragon Force Augmentation》 have been
completed. Confirm what kind of power you have
obtained!

MsgJp:
そういえば、おまえはすでに
かなりの礎に触れ、エリアに貢献して
きたのではないか？
MsgEn:
Come to think of it, you've already touched
quite a few Portcrystals and contributed
to the area, haven't you?

MsgJp:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
MsgEn:
I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more
to say.

MsgJp:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
MsgEn:
I see. If you're satisfied, I have nothing more
to say.

MsgJp:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
MsgEn:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and
use it.

MsgJp:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
MsgEn:
I see.
It's valuable, so be sure to think carefully and
use it.

MsgJp:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
MsgEn:
I believe that if we keep fighting all the time,
it will be impossible to grasp the situation. I
still cannot avoid the division of forces.

MsgJp:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
MsgEn:
If that's your intention,
it's extremely presumptuous.

MsgJp:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
Now, let us release the power of the Orb. Quiet
your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
Now let us release the power of the Orb
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

MsgJp:
そろそろ明るい兆しが見えても良いはずだが――
セシリーには焦るなと言ったものの
一番落ち着くべきなのはわたしかもしれんな
MsgEn:
There should be a silver lining by now-- Although
I told Cecily not to rush I'm probably the one who
needs to calm down the most.

MsgJp:
そんな世界があるとして、そこでは
どんな道理がはたらくのか――想像もつかんわ
MsgEn:
If there is such a world, I can't imagine what
kind of reasoning would work there--I can't
imagine it!

MsgJp:
たとえば、各エリアランクが上昇したり
リム転移先とできる礎が解放されるといった
働きだな
MsgEn:
For example, it works by increasing the rank of
each area or
releasing Portcrystals that can be used as a Rift
Teleport destination.

MsgJp:
つまり、警戒していたはずだ
それなのに何故――
MsgEn: I mean, they should have been warned. So why--

MsgJp:
とすれば竜力の継承抜きに竜の討伐は
考えられないとは思わんか？
MsgEn:
Don't you think it's impossible to defeat a
dragon without inheriting the power of Dragon
Force Augmentation?

MsgJp:
どうした、不安なことがあるのか？
まず、おまえたちが落ち着かなくては
MsgEn:
What's wrong? Is there something that's making
you anxious? First, you guys need to calm down.

MsgJp:
どこかへ行っていたのか？
ふむ――これは隠し事の臭いだな
MsgEn:
Did you go somewhere? Hmmm... This has the smell
of a secret.

MsgJp:
どこへ行ってどう戦うべきか――
我々が考えるから、おまえは何も考えずに
戦ってくれればいい
MsgEn:
Where to go and how to fight―― Just fight without
thinking, as we will do the thinking for you.

MsgJp:
どのように成長したかは
見た目ではわからないからな
アーチボルトのところへ行って
確認してみることをすすめるよ
MsgEn:
How you have grown is not apparent from your
appearance, so I recommend going to Archibald's
place and checking to confirm.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp:
ふむ――
順調に覚者としての階段を登っているようだな
頼もしいことだ
MsgEn:
Hmm― It seems like you're steadily climbing the
steps as an Arisen. That's reliable.

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブで
《<VAL>》
を使っても、解放するスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
MsgEn:
Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills to
release by using 《<VAL>》 in this job. Although the
effects related to skills will be wasted, is it
okay to use the orb?

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブで《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、上げられるスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
MsgEn:
Hmm―― It seems that there are no skills that can
be raised even if you use the 《「LV.80」Orb of
Growth》 on this job.
Although the effects related to skills will be
wasted, is it okay to use the orb?

MsgJp:
ふむ――このジョブでは
《<VAL>》
を使っても
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
MsgEn:
Hmm... In this job, even if you use《<VAL>》, the
effects of leveling up will be wasted. Are you
still going to use the treasure orb?

MsgJp:
ふむ、年かな――
話したいことがあったはずだが、忘れてしまったよ
MsgEn:
Hmm, I wonder... Must be getting old―― I had
something I wanted to talk about, but I forgot.

MsgJp:
ふん――
重大な事はいくらでもあるというのに
エリオットのことばかり考えてしまう
MsgEn:
Hmm――
Even though there are countless important things
to consider,
I can't help but think only about Elliot.

MsgJp:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているのだな
MsgEn:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force
Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

MsgJp:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているようだぞ
MsgEn:
Hmm...
You have already completed the "Dragon Force
Augmentation" inheritance, haven't you?

MsgJp:
ほう、
《<VAL>》
を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
MsgEn:
Wow,
You brought 《<VAL>》!
This is another valuable thing you've got.

MsgJp:
ほう、《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
MsgEn:
Oh, you brought the 《LV.80 Orb of Growth》
This is quite a valuable item that you've
obtained.

MsgJp:
ほう、これは
《<VAL>》
だな
MsgEn:
Well, this is
《<VAL>》

MsgJp:
ほら、そんな顔をするな
あくまでも可能性の話だ
MsgEn:
Don't make that face.
It's just a discussion of possibilities.

MsgJp:
まさかレオまで――
いや、それはあるまい――なあ？
MsgEn: No way, not even Leo-- No, that's not-- hey?

MsgJp:
まずは王子が戻らないことには
どうにも動きようがないな
MsgEn:
First of all, if the prince doesn't come back,
there's no way to make a move.

MsgJp: また落ち着かない日々が始まるようだな
MsgEn: Looks like another restless day ahead.

MsgJp:
もう一刻の猶予も許されないのだろう
さあ、行ってくれ
MsgEn:
I guess there is no time left for another moment
of delay.
Now, please go.

MsgJp:
もし時間があるのなら
たまにでいいから、島の様子を見てくれよ
MsgEn:
If you will it, you should become the person to
wield the Sword of Radiance.

MsgJp:
もちろん王子の安全をいち早く確保して
気持ちを尊重すべく話し合うことも重要だ
MsgEn:
Of course, it is important to promptly ensure the
prince's safety and have respectful discussions.

MsgJp:
やはりわたしも一度はアッカーシェランを
訪ねる必要があるようだ
MsgEn:
It seems that I also need to visit Acre Selund at
least once.

MsgJp:
わしほどの激動を生きた神官はいないだろうが
はて、喜ぶべきか嘆くべきか――
MsgEn:
There could be no priest who has experienced such
turmoil as I have. Well, should I rejoice or
should I lament?

MsgJp:
アークの攻略方法はわたしにまかせて――
ほら、今のうちに休んでおけ
MsgEn:
Leave the strategy for the Ark to me - Now, go
and rest while you can.

MsgJp:
アークを送り込みんできた者の名は――
いや、やめておこう
MsgEn:
The name of the person who sent the Ark is - No,
let's stop here.

MsgJp: イリスは本当に大丈夫なのか？
MsgEn: Is Iris really okay?

MsgJp: イリスを通じて敵を知る――ひとつの方策だ
MsgEn:
Using Iris to understand the enemy――a single
strategy.

MsgJp:
オーク臭いようだな
神殿では気をつけた方がいい
MsgEn:
I smell orcs in the air. You better be careful in
the temple.

MsgJp:
ガルドリン、リズ、エリオットをうまく使って
この困難を乗り切ってくれ
むろん、わたしにできることはなんでもする
MsgEn:
Use Gurdolin, Lise, and Elliot effectively to
help us overcome this difficulty Of course, I will
do anything I can.

MsgJp:
キースヒルトか――
ここで暮らしてくれれば安心なのだが
あの種族は偏屈だからな――
MsgEn:
Kieshildt―― If they live here, we can feel at
ease But that species is obstinate――

MsgJp:
スキルの確認は落ち着いてからにしなさい
よし、最後はアビリティか
――目を閉じて集中するのだ
MsgEn:
Check your skills only after you've calmed down.
Okay, the last thing you need is abilities.
--Close your eyes and concentrate.

MsgJp:
セシリーが一命を取り留めた
憂いがひとつ消えたというわけだ
再び、前へ進もうではないか
MsgEn: Leave the rest to your pawn.

MsgJp:
セシリーにはよくしてやるのだぞ？
ぜひ、強い友情の絆を結んでくれ
少々の利害の対立などに負けぬ、強い絆を
MsgEn:
Not to be swayed by an invisible enemy, to search
for the truth while focusing on the enemy.

MsgJp: セシリーの場合はどのような事情なのだろうな
MsgEn:
I wonder what the circumstances are in Cecily's
case.

MsgJp:
セシリーは重い責任に押し潰されそうに
なってはいないか？
側にいて、支えてやるといい
MsgEn: Now, take a break. Your role is far from over.

MsgJp:
フィンダムのことはフィンダムの民たちが
よく知っているだろう
MsgEn:
What the Arisen does - That is the final hope of
Lestania.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの完全な復興には
まだまだ時間がかかるだろう
時々訪ねて、経過を報告しておくれ
MsgEn:
The complete recovery of Phindym will still take
a long time. Please check in occasionally and
report on the progress.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの汚れとともに
あの男の闇も浄化されるだろうよ
MsgEn:
Together with the earth of Phindym,
his darkness will also be purified.

MsgJp:
ブラッドオーブは続々と集まっているが
効果は薄いと言わざるをえないのだ
MsgEn:
Blood orbs are gathering one after another, but
it must be said that their effectiveness is weak.

MsgJp:
ポーンとの契約は進んでいるか？
終わればいよいよ一人前の覚者だな
MsgEn:
Is the contract with the Pawn progressing? Once
it's finished, you'll finally become a
full-fledged Arisen.

MsgJp:
ミシアルは最近のイリスにまつわる
うわさを知っていた
MsgEn: Mysial knew the recent rumors about Iris.

MsgJp:
メイリーフの正体は他言無用
約束だからな
MsgEn: Mayleaf's true identity is a secret it's a promise

MsgJp: メイロワ将軍とはうまくやれそうか？
MsgEn:
Do you think you and General Meirova will get
along well?

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍も策を講じていることだろう
しのぎきれば未来は明るいぞ
MsgEn:
General Meirova is also likely taking measures
If we endure, the future will be bright

MsgJp:
リズから聞いたところによると
ネド王子が行方不明なのだとか
しかも自分の意志で城を出たらしい
MsgEn:
According to what Lise told me,
it seems that Prince Nedo is missing,
and furthermore, he seems to have left the castle
on his own accord.

MsgJp: レオが悩んでいるようだが――
MsgEn: Leo seems to be having trouble--

MsgJp:
レオとは会えたか？
わたしが心配していたと伝えてくれ
MsgEn: Did you see Leo? Tell him I was worried.

MsgJp: レオの姿が見えないがじきに戻るだろう
MsgEn: No sign of Leo, but he'll be back soon.

MsgJp:
レオはまだか？
今後のこととイリスの処遇を相談せねばならん
見かけたら、すぐここへ来るように言ってくれ
MsgEn:
Is Leo here yet? We need to discuss future plans
and how to handle Iris. If you see him, tell him
to come here immediately.

MsgJp: レオは何か言ってこないのか？
MsgEn: Leo didn't say anything?

MsgJp:
レスタニアの未来は文字どおり
おまえたちの活躍にかかっている
MsgEn: The future of Lestania depends on your actions

MsgJp:
ロイグとセシリーの記憶合わせが
不調に終わってから
嫌な予感しかしないのだ
MsgEn: Go and defeat the leader of the Arch-Corruption

MsgJp:
ロイグのことは聞いた
なんとも無念ではあるが――
MsgEn:
I heard about Loeg
It is truly regrettable but - -

MsgJp:
ロイグの病気がわたしの知るものであれば
相当苦しいはずだ
早く助けてやりたいものだな
MsgEn:
If Loeg's illness is what I think it is he must
be in a lot of pain I'm thinking of getting
involved personally.

MsgJp:
今は――
セシリーを疎ましく思ったことを恥じて
回復を祈るばかりだ
MsgEn:
Eliminating the core should disperse the
Corruption demons.

MsgJp: 今一度会い、真意を聞いてみたいものだ
MsgEn:
I would like to see him again and hear his true
intentions.

MsgJp:
会議に参加したい？
それよりも戦いの準備を進めてくれ
MsgEn:
Do you want to attend the meeting? Please focus
on preparing for the battle instead.

MsgJp:
会議の長さに不満が出ていることは知っている
しかし、事はレスタニアの未来に
大きく影響するだろう
MsgEn:
I am aware that there is dissatisfaction with the
length of the meeting. However, this matter will
greatly impact the future of Lestania.

MsgJp: 何か心配事でも？
MsgEn: What's worrying you?

MsgJp:
何が起こっていようとも
我々が当事者でなければ良いと思っていたが
案の定、焼け石を拾ってしまったようだ
MsgEn:
Regardless of what may happen, we had hoped that
we wouldn't be involved, but sure enough, it seems
like we've picked up a burnt stone.

MsgJp:
侵食魔どもめ――
奴らのせいでじっくり考える事もできん
MsgEn:
Those invaders-- they're the reason I can't even
think straight.

MsgJp:
協力を惜しむ必要はないが
レスタニアの利を忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
There is no need to be stingy with collaboration,
but don't forget about the benefit of Lestania.

MsgJp:
危険は避けられないとしても
無謀な行動は慎むのだぞ
MsgEn:
Even though danger is inevitable,
you must refrain from reckless behavior.

MsgJp:
問題は幾つもあるが
せめて侵食魔だけでも排除できないものだろうか
そうなれば人員配置が楽になるのだが
MsgEn:
There are a number of problems, but can we at
least eliminate the Corruption demon? That would
make manpower allocation a lot easier.

MsgJp:
奪われた《原始の雫》――
多少出過ぎた真似をしてもかまわんから
必ず取り戻すのだぞ
MsgEn:
The Arisen must fight to protect the land. All we
can do is believe.

MsgJp:
奪われた城を取り戻すという悲願の成就
解放軍の面々はさぞ喜んでいるだろう
MsgEn:
The fulfillment of the long-held dream of
regaining the castle that was taken from us
I'm sure the liberation army is very happy to see
you.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放したぞ
本来の効果は得られずとも
解放した力は大地を巡り
またいつの日かおまえの元へ戻るだろう
MsgEn:
I have unleashed the power of the Orb.
Even if the original effect cannot be obtained,
The unleashed power will traverse the land,
And one day, it will surely return to you.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放することで
各地とおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
MsgEn:
By releasing the power of the Orb,
your ties to the regions will
grow stronger.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
MsgEn:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of
the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once
and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting
unnecessarily.

MsgJp:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
MsgEn:
It may take a little time to unleash the power of
the treasure.
It would be better for the party to disband once
and come back.
You may end up keeping the party members waiting
unnecessarily.

MsgJp:
弱っているところをああも露骨に見せるのは
いかがなものかな――
MsgEn:
Is it really necessary to make one's weaknesses
so obvious...

MsgJp:
当面の目的であったネド王子の救出は
思惑通りに終わったわけだが――
MsgEn:
The rescue mission of Prince Nedo, which was the
immediate objective, has ended as planned.

MsgJp:
思えば、わたしの記憶の中の白竜は
いつも病み、苦しんでいた
しかし、これほど痛ましい状況は初めてだ
MsgEn:
Looking back, the White Dragon in my memories
was always sick and suffering
However, this is the first time I have witnessed
such a painful situation.

MsgJp:
悠々と、ただそこにある世界を前に――
我々はなんと小さく、稚拙な存在なのだろうな
MsgEn:
In front of the serene and simply existing
world-- We are so small and immature, aren't we?

MsgJp: 想像するとわたしまで頬が緩むわ
MsgEn: I can't help but smile when I think about it.

MsgJp: 慌てて結論に飛びついてはいかんのだ
MsgEn: We shouldn't jump to conclusions in a hurry.

MsgJp:
我々で迎えることができてうれしいよ
ああ、これは本心だ
MsgEn:
I'm glad we can welcome you here. Ah, this is
sincere.

MsgJp:
我々は常に己を律し、不測の事態に備えねばならん
わかってはいるが――なかなか、なぁ
MsgEn:
We must always discipline ourselves and be
prepared for unforeseen circumstances. I
understand this, but... it's quite difficult.

MsgJp: 指示や助言をしようにも情報が足りんわ
MsgEn:
Even if I try to give instructions or advice,
there is not enough information.

MsgJp: 敵の攻勢は予想通りだ
MsgEn: The enemy's offensive is predictable.

MsgJp:
敵の砦に乗り込むと聞いている
くれぐれも気をつけてな
MsgEn:
I hear you're going to ride into an enemy
stronghold.
Take care.

MsgJp:
日がな一日ここに立ち、竜を思い、政を思う
おまえたちを思う時間はほとんどないが、まあ許せ
MsgEn:
I stand here all day long, thinking about dragons
and thinking about politics. I don't have much
time to think about you all, but well, it's
forgivable.

MsgJp:
時に、ロイグの行方はまだわからんのか
もしや救いを求めているということはないか？
MsgEn:
Sometimes, is it still unknown where Loeg is.
Is it possible that he is seeking salvation?

MsgJp: 時間を見つけて外へ出てみるんだな
MsgEn:
Find some time and go outside and see for
yourself.

MsgJp:
機先を制するには腰を据えた思索が
不可欠だというのに――
MsgEn:
In order to take the lead, it is crucial to
engage in in-depth contemplation and reflection.

MsgJp:
次から次へと――どうしてくれようか
オークどもの対処だけでも大変なのに
今度はアークだと？
MsgEn:
From one thing to another―― how are we supposed
to handle this? Just dealing with the orcs
themselves is already tough enough, and now it's
the Ark?

MsgJp: 次の動きが気になるところだな
MsgEn: I'm curious about the next move.

MsgJp:
気になることがあるのなら
さっさと解決しておくことを薦めるよ
MsgEn:
If there is something on your mind, I recommend
resolving it promptly.

MsgJp:
無事LV.80になったようだぞ
さて、次はスキルだな
――もう一度目を閉じるがよい
MsgEn:
It seems like I've safely reached level 80.
Now, it's time for skills.
―― Close your eyes once again.

MsgJp:
状況が変われば考え方を変える
その柔軟さが美点だったが――
それすらも変わってしまったのだろうか
MsgEn:
If the situation changes, change your way of
thinking That flexibility was a virtue, but- Has
that even changed too?

MsgJp:
狙われるのはメイリーフだけではない、とな
自分の身勝手さに驚くしかなかったよ
MsgEn:
It was not only Mayleaf who was targeted. I could
only be surprised by my own selfishness.

MsgJp: 理の外の世界――
MsgEn: The world outside of Order--

MsgJp:
異郷の地にひとり残るとは
エリオットの評価を改めねばならんな
MsgEn:
To remain alone in a foreign land,
I'll have to revise my assessment of Elliott.

MsgJp: 異郷の姿、その目でしかと見届けよ
MsgEn:
Even if it is possible that the spirits of the
young trees in the forest may be the spirits of
your hometown, I think the only thing you can do
right now is hope and pray.

MsgJp:
白竜の意思を完全に理解することは難しい
たとえ巫女でもな
MsgEn:
It is difficult to fully understand the
intentions of the White Dragon, even if one is a
priestess.

MsgJp:
白竜はフィンダムの精霊竜ウィルミアに
語りかけようとしているがうまくいかないようだ
MsgEn:
The rest-- that is the responsibility of The
White Dragon and the task of The White Dragon.

MsgJp:
白竜様へはおまえから報告するといい
つもる話はそれからでも遅くはない
MsgEn:
It is best to report to The White Dragon
personally. There is no harm in talking about it
later.

MsgJp: 短期決戦と相成ればよいが
MsgEn: I hope it's a short war.

MsgJp: 砦との往復は何度目だ？
MsgEn: How many times have you been to the fort and back?

MsgJp:
砦に限らず、あちこち自分の足で
行ってみることが大切だ
地図を眺めていても頭に入らんだろうからな
MsgEn:
It is important to go and see for yourself, not
just in the fortress but also in various places.
Even if you look at the map, it won't make sense
in your head.

MsgJp:
竜と竜力、そして大地の恵みが不可分で
ある以上、竜のいない大陸は
考えられない
MsgEn:
Dragon and Dragon Force, along with the blessings
of the earth, are inseparable. Therefore, a
continent without dragons is unimaginable.

MsgJp:
竜の意志を紡ぐこと
それが我らを災いから救うのだ
MsgEn:
To weave the will of the dragon That is what will
save us from disaster

MsgJp:
精神的な強い衝撃が人の記憶を奪うという
話は昔から知られている
MsgEn:
The story of a strong psychological impact that
robs people of their memory has been known since
ancient times.

MsgJp:
聞こえてくる話から想像するに
ネド王子の性根は悪くなさそうだ
友好的な関係を築いてくれよ
MsgEn:
From the stories I hear, it seems that Prince
Nedo is not a bad person at heart. He has built
friendly relationships.

MsgJp:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
MsgEn:
I'm trying to tell myself that
but it's not easy to--

MsgJp: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
MsgEn: Calm down――You need to calm down.

MsgJp:
見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
MsgEn:
From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a
maiden with an innocent heart...

MsgJp:
覚者に力を与えたぶんだけ
白竜自身の回復が遅れる――
そう考えることもできる
MsgEn:
For the Arisen, the more power they are given,
the slower The White Dragon's recovery becomes— It
can be thought of that way.

MsgJp:
覚者のことは覚者に任せるしかない
よく見ていてやるんだぞ
MsgEn:
We have to let the Arisen take care of the
Arisen. You're going to have to watch them very
closely.

MsgJp:
覚者の本分は白竜の回復を助けることだ
――ゆめゆめ忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
The Arisen's true duty is to aid in the recovery
of The White Dragon. - Never, ever forget that.

MsgJp:
覚者よ、頼んだぞ
おまえたちの働きが大勢を決める
MsgEn:
Arisen, I'm counting on you. Your work will
determine the outcome for many.

MsgJp:
覚者を育てるのは、結局のところ経験だ
いや、これは覚者に限らないがな
MsgEn:
The cultivation of an Arisen ultimately comes
down to experience. No, this applies not only to
Arisens.

MsgJp:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
MsgEn:
With the recent momentum gained by the People's
Liberation Army, the chaos in Acre Selund is
expected to further escalate.

MsgJp:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
MsgEn:
I will do everything I can. At the very least, I
will support you with my prayers.

MsgJp:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
MsgEn:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

MsgJp: 誇り高き孤独な魂――
MsgEn: Proud, lonely souls--

MsgJp:
賛成しかねるが――
無為なことと断じるつもりもない
MsgEn:
I cannot agree, but I have no intention of
calling it meaningless.

MsgJp:
近々、ある調査団を派遣することになってな
その人選で、いささか多忙だ
MsgEn:
I'm sending a survey team soon and I'm somewhat
busy with the selection process.

MsgJp:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
MsgEn:
If we defeat the leader of the Corruption demons,
the power of the Corruption should dissipate.

MsgJp:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
MsgEn: How'd it go? I'm waiting for good news.

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
MsgEn:
When the knight order and the Arisen join forces
and fight together, There is no opponent we cannot
defeat.

MsgJp:
いいのか――
俺たち覚者はこのままでいいのだろうか――
MsgEn:
Is this okay――
Are we, the Arisen, fine as we are――

MsgJp:
おまえは感じたことはないか？
自分の真ん中を貫く、熱いモノ――
それが揺らぎ、壊れてしまう不安を
MsgEn:
Have you ever felt it?
The intense thing that pierces through your core -
The uncertainty that wavers and breaks.

MsgJp: この仕打ちは――なんだ――
MsgEn: What is this strike- what is it?

MsgJp:
ご苦労だったな
とりあえず今は何もない
MsgEn:
You went through a lot of trouble.
For now, there is nothing.

MsgJp:
その男がアークを送り込み――
ズールを使ってオークを取りまとめ――
イリスの正気とキースヒルトの命を奪った――
MsgEn:
The man sent the Ark--
using Zuhl to gather the Orcs--
and took away Iris's sanity and Kieshildt's life--

MsgJp: どうした、深刻な顔だな
MsgEn: What's wrong? You look serious.

MsgJp: どうした。俺には遠慮は無用だ
MsgEn: What's wrong? No need to hesitate with me.

MsgJp: どこにいる――今すぐにでも倒してやる！
MsgEn: Where are they - I'll take them down right now!

MsgJp: やるべきことをやろう――お互いにな
MsgEn: Let's do what we have to do--for each other.

MsgJp:
よし、今後、あの子のことは
おまえに任せるとしよう
MsgEn:
All right,
I'll leave her in your hands from now on.

MsgJp: アークの話は知っているか？
MsgEn: Do you know the story of the Ark?

MsgJp:
イリスのことは俺にまかせてくれ
長い付き合いだ
MsgEn:
I'll take care of Iris.
We've known each other a long time.

MsgJp:
イリスの件で動いてくれたそうだな
俺からも礼をいう
世話になった
MsgEn:
I've heard that you took action regarding the
matter concerning Iris.
I also want to say thank you.
I appreciate your assistance.

MsgJp: キースヒルトの死はけして無駄ではない
MsgEn: The death of Kieshildt is by no means in vain.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフが最善を尽くそうとしていることは
わかっているが――さすがに焦れるな
MsgEn:
I understand that Joseph is doing his best, but-
understandably- he gets impatient.

MsgJp: ディアマンテス――
MsgEn: Diamantes--

MsgJp: メイリーフがなついているようだな
MsgEn: Looks like you've got a soft spot for Mayleaf.

MsgJp:
メイリーフも普通の娘ではないから
そう簡単に敵の手に落ちたりはしないだろう
MsgEn:
Mayleaf is not an ordinary girl, so she wouldn't
easily fall into the hands of enemies.

MsgJp: 休むか遊ぶか――好きにしてくれ
MsgEn: Rest or play――do as you please.

MsgJp: 体は常に鍛えておけよ
MsgEn: You've got to keep your body in shape.

MsgJp:
何者だ、ディアマンテス――
いや、聞いたことはある
レスタニアを繁栄の世界から戦場に変えた
張本人――
MsgEn:
Who are you, Diamantes--
No, I've heard of you before.
You're the one who turned Lestania from a
prosperous world into a battlefield,
The mastermind--

MsgJp:
多少無理をしてでもメイリーフを
連れ戻して欲しかったが――
まあ、今はそのキースヒルトを信じるしか
ないようだな
MsgEn:
No matter how unreasonable it may be, I wanted
you to bring Mayleaf back...
Well, it seems like now I have no choice but to
believe in Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
彼女の信頼を裏切るような者がいれば
話は別だが――
MsgEn:
If there is someone who betrays her trust, it's a
different story...

MsgJp:
忘れるな
俺たちは覚者――使命に生き、使命に死す者だ
MsgEn:
Do not forget
We are the Arisen - those who live and die for
the mission.

MsgJp:
悪いな
茶飲み話なら、後にしてくれ
MsgEn:
Sorry
If it's just casual conversation, please save it
for later.

MsgJp:
探究心を忘れず、常に新しいものに触れろ
覚者の人生は長い
退屈すると――つらいぞ
MsgEn:
Explore without forgetting your heart and always
touch something new.
The life of an Arisen is long.
It is painful to be bored.

MsgJp:
敵の会話に登場したエルフとは
間違いなくキースヒルトのことだ
狙われているとあれば放ってはおけない
MsgEn:
Whoever the elf mentioned in the enemy's
conversation is, it's definitely Kieshildt. If
they're being targeted, I can't just leave them
alone.

MsgJp:
時間を作って、なるべく歩きまわれ
神殿をくまなく見て回るのもいいし
遠出してみるのもいいだろう
MsgEn:
Make time to walk around as much as possible.
You can look all over the temple or
go far away!

MsgJp:
気を抜くなよ
絶対に安全な場所なんてのは無いからな
MsgEn:
Don't let your guard down.
There is no such thing as an absolutely safe
place.

MsgJp:
派遣した調査団が調べているのだろうが
早く正体を知りたいものだな
MsgEn:
I wonder what the dispatched investigation team
is examining.
I really want to know their true identity soon.

MsgJp:
白竜に命が捧げられる限り――
誰の命も無駄にはならない
MsgEn:
As long as a life is dedicated to the White
Dragon--
No one's life will be wasted.

MsgJp:
白竜の力――
少しでも多く継承できれば――
MsgEn:
The power of the White Dragon - If even a little
can be inherited -

MsgJp:
腐れモゴックめ――
ただですむと思うなよ
MsgEn:
Mogok, you rotten scoundrel――
Don't think you'll get off easy.

MsgJp:
腕試しに一戦やるか？
おっと、そんな顔するな――冗談さ
MsgEn:
You want to try your hand at a fight?
Oops, don't give me that look--I'm kidding.

MsgJp:
衣食の面倒までは見切れないから
自分でなんとかしてくれ
MsgEn:
I can't take care of your food and clothing, so
you're on your own.

MsgJp:
覚者であることには慣れたか？
道は――見えたか？
MsgEn:
Have you become accustomed to being an Arisen?
Did the path become visible?

MsgJp:
覚者として生きることに
見返りを求めたことはなかったが
MsgEn:
As an Arisen, I have never sought anything in
return for living this way.

MsgJp:
覚者として生きるということは
白竜と世界の行く末を見届ける――ということだ
MsgEn:
To live as an Arisen means to witness the fate of
The White Dragon and the world.

MsgJp: 覚者ひまなし――いつものことだ
MsgEn: There is no free time for an arisen――as always.

MsgJp:
言っておくが、俺が面倒を見てやれるのは
おまえが行くべき場所――
戦うべき相手の指示だけだ
MsgEn:
Let me make it clear, the only thing I can do for
you is
to give you directions on where you should go -
only instructions on who you should engage in
battle with.

MsgJp:
話せば――わかるさ
ああ――きっとわかる
MsgEn:
Talk to him--you'll understand.
Yeah--you'll understand.

MsgJp: ――あんた目付き、レオに似てきたね
MsgEn: You have a similar expression to Leo, huh.

MsgJp:
ああ、忙しい――
誰かさんの人使いが荒いのか
わたしの要領が悪いのか――
MsgEn:
Oh, I'm so busy--
Either someone's not being very helpful...
Or maybe I'm just not very good at what I do.

MsgJp:
あんたが頑張ってくれるとわたしがちょっと
楽になるからね！
MsgEn:
If you work hard, I'll be a little
relieved!

MsgJp:
あんたなかなかやるよね
これでわたし、楽できるかも？
MsgEn:
You're quite good, aren't you?
Maybe this will make things easier for me.

MsgJp:
いい奴だから、覚えておきなよ
ファビオね、ファビオ
MsgEn:
He's a good guy, so remember him.
Fabio, right, Fabio.

MsgJp:
さあ、どうするの？
覚者なら、迷いなんてないでしょ？
MsgEn:
Well, what are you going to do?
If you are Arisen, you shouldn't have any doubts,
right?

MsgJp:
さっそくご活躍だね！
うん、いいよぉ
MsgEn:
You're doing great already!
Yeah, sure!

MsgJp: そういえば、ファビオって覚者とは会った？
MsgEn: By the way, have you met Fabio, the Arisen?

MsgJp: なに？　なになに？
MsgEn: What?　What, what, what?

MsgJp:
わからないんだよね
何が正しくて、何が間違ってるのか――
MsgEn:
I don't know, you know.
What is right and what is wrong -

MsgJp: わくわくするね
MsgEn: I'm excited, aren't you?

MsgJp:
わたしには力がある
だから、それを使うのは当然――うん、当然
MsgEn:
I have the power
So, it's only natural to use it - yes, naturally!

MsgJp:
何？
わたしの顔に、何かついてる？
MsgEn:
What?
Do I have something on my face?

MsgJp:
手伝ってあげられなくてごめんよ
わたしはわたしで忙しくてさ
MsgEn:
I'm sorry I can't help you.
I'm busy with my own things.

MsgJp:
敵を倒して、魔物を狩って――
もっと強くなれば別の生き方が見えるのかな
MsgEn:
Defeat the enemies and hunt the monsters――
If I become stronger, will I be able to see a
different way of living?

MsgJp:
楽しい時間って、限られてるから
価値あるんだよね
MsgEn: Fun times are limited, so it's worth it.

MsgJp:
結局さ、どうなるかわかんないよね
世界なんてさ
MsgEn:
In the end, you never know what will happen, you
know?
The world and all that.

MsgJp:
自信持っていいんじゃない？
あんたなら、できそうな気がする
MsgEn:
You should have confidence.
I think you can do it.

MsgJp: 難しい顔しちゃって――悩みでもあるの？
MsgEn: You look so concerned - what's troubling you?

MsgJp:
くれぐれも己の力に溺れるなよ
どんな戦士も、過信という泥沼には
簡単に足を取られる
MsgEn:
Please do not indulge in your own power. Any
warrior can easily get trapped in the quagmire of
overconfidence.

MsgJp: ふん――ひまそうだな
MsgEn: Hmm, it looks like you have some free time, huh?

MsgJp: ほう？　我々騎士団に何用だ
MsgEn: What?　What do you want with us Knights?

MsgJp:
グリッテン砦のヴァネッサ殿が
来ているようだが――
騎士団は蚊帳の外か？
MsgEn:
It seems that Lady Vanessa of Fort Gritten is
coming--
Is the knights order out of the loop?

MsgJp:
人智を超えた敵であろうと、我らは戦わねばならない
それが騎士というものだ
MsgEn:
We must fight even against enemies beyond human
understanding.
That's what knighthood is all about!

MsgJp:
時間があるのなら
外の魔物でも倒してきたらどうだ
MsgEn:
If you have time, why don't you go and defeat
some monsters outside?

MsgJp:
死を覚悟し、同時に生を諦めないこと
それが戦場で生きのびる秘訣だ
MsgEn:
Be prepared to die and not give up on life at the
same time.
That's the secret to survival on the battlefield.
To face death and at the same time not give up on
life,
That is the secret to surviving on the
battlefield.

MsgJp:
礼節を忘れるな
この《謁見の間》では特にな
MsgEn:
Do not forget the etiquette
In this 《Audience Chamber》, especially

MsgJp:
規律なくして人は動かぬ
例外は――ない
MsgEn:
Without discipline, people will not work.
There are no exceptions.

MsgJp:
覚者といえども軍規には従ってもらう
仲間の命を守るためだ
MsgEn:
Even though they are Arisen, they must obey
military regulations. It is to protect the lives
of their comrades.

MsgJp:
覚者とは、常に責務を負う者
白竜に、地に、人に――
すべてに仕える者だということを忘れるな
MsgEn:
The Arisen is someone who always bears
responsibility.
To the White Dragon, to the land, to the people—
never forget that they serve everyone.

MsgJp:
覚者は勝手な連中が多いが――
貴殿は悪習に染まるなよ
MsgEn:
Arisen often tend to be a bunch of troublemakers,
but...
Don't let yourself be tainted by bad habits.

MsgJp:
重要な話か？
違うなら後にしてくれ
MsgEn:
Is it an important conversation?
If not, please postpone it.

MsgJp:
騎士団の犠牲は竜の力となることで
報われる――ああ、そうとも
MsgEn:
The sacrifice of the knights will be rewarded
with the power of the dragon - oh, indeed.

MsgJp:
グリッテンの守備隊を増強している
覚者は基本的に遊軍として参加可能だ
MsgEn:
We are augmenting the garrison of Gritten.
Arisen can join guerrilla force.

MsgJp: 砦周辺の敵がいつでも貴殿を待っているぞ
MsgEn:
The enemies around the fortress are always
waiting for you.

MsgJp:
白竜様の言葉――
ひと言も聴き逃すわけにはいかんな
MsgEn:
The world you see and the world I see might be
different.

MsgJp:
貴殿はイリスと親しかったようだが――
覚悟しておいた方が良さそうだ
MsgEn:
It seems that you were close with Iris, but it's
better to be prepared.

MsgJp:
白竜の敵とあれば厳しい結論が
下るだろうからな
MsgEn:
Because if you're an enemy of The White Dragon,
you're going to come to some harsh conclusions.

MsgJp:
イリスは騎士団の中でも人気のある覚者だ
もし討伐ということになれば――
MsgEn:
Iris is a popular Arisen among the Order of
Knights. If it comes to a subjugation...

MsgJp: いや、考えたくもない
MsgEn: No, I don't even want to think about it.

MsgJp:
――面目ない
巫女殿を連れ去られるとは――
MsgEn: Unthinkable — to have the Priestess taken away...

MsgJp:
くそっ――レオめ――
手加減するとは無礼な――
MsgEn:
Damn it ―― Leo ――
It is rude to hold back ――

MsgJp:
騎士たる者はやはり戦場に立たねばな
メルゴダで会おうではないか
MsgEn:
A knight must indeed stand on the battlefield.
Let us meet in Mergoda.

MsgJp: さあ、ともに戦おうではないか！
MsgEn: Well, let's fight together, shall we?

MsgJp:
ディアマンテスを退けたからといって
すべての問題が解決するわけではないだろう
しかし今は――
MsgEn:
However, just because we have defeated Diamantes,
it does not mean that all problems will be
resolved.
However, for now...

MsgJp: ああ、感慨無量とはこのことだな
MsgEn: Ah, this is what "overwhelmed with emotion" means.

MsgJp:
立場上不謹慎な発言かもしれんが
世のこういう状況はけして嫌いではないのだ
貴殿なら、わかるだろう？
MsgEn:
It may be inappropriate for me to say this from
my standpoint, but I don't dislike this kind of
situation in the world. You know what I mean,
don't you?

MsgJp:
戦場で貴殿の顔を見ると
ああ、負けはないな、と思うのだ
MsgEn:
When I see your face on the battlefield,
Ah, I think there is no defeat.

MsgJp:
長いこと、覚者などイケ好かない連中だと
思っていたが、この変わりよう――
自分のことながら、笑うわ
MsgEn:
For a long time, I thought that people like
Arisen were not good, but this change... even I
have to laugh.

MsgJp:
セシリーやレオのことが気にかかるだろうが
それならなおのこと侵食魔退治に
邁進しようではないか
MsgEn:
You might be concerned about Cecily and Leo,
But if that's the case, we should strive even
more to exterminate the corruption and infected.

MsgJp: 結局はそれが近道になるだろうよ
MsgEn: In the end, that will probably be the shortcut.

MsgJp:
レスタニア中のブラッドオーブを
根こそぎここに集めるぞ！
MsgEn:
I will gather all the Blood Orbs in Lestania,
from every corner!

MsgJp:
他に火急の任がないのであれば
貴殿も力を貸してくれ
MsgEn:
If you have no other pressing duties,
you can help.

MsgJp:
騎士団の士気は高いが、それでどうにか
なるわけでもなし――
何か他の道はないのか！
MsgEn:
The morale of the knight order is high, but that
alone doesn't lead to anything—Isn't there any
other way?

MsgJp: ミシアルの姿が見えたらしいな
MsgEn: I hear you got a glimpse of Mysial.

MsgJp:
死してなおレスタニアを思う気持ちが
うれしいではないか
MsgEn:
I'm glad you're still thinking of Lestania even
in death.

MsgJp:
貴殿はまるで竜を救うために
生まれてきたようだな
いやいや、深い意味はない
MsgEn:
It seems as though you were born to save dragons.
No, no, there is no deeper meaning.

MsgJp:
有用な情報は――
いまのところ、無い
MsgEn: There is no useful information at the moment.

MsgJp:
誰もかれもが仲良くやれるなんて
そんな都合のいい話はない
MsgEn:
No one can get along with everyone. It's not that
convenient.

MsgJp:
真の平和、正しき統治――
その足掛かりはどこにある――
MsgEn:
True peace, just governance-- Where is that
foothold--?

MsgJp: 忙しいんだ、後にしてくれ
MsgEn: I'm busy, do it later.

MsgJp:
いつでも力は貸す
だが、慣れ合うつもりはないぞ、覚者
MsgEn:
I will lend you my strength, but I have no
intention of getting too familiar, Arisen.

MsgJp:
我が騎士団の力、侮るな
覚者だけが、白竜の盾ではない
MsgEn:
Do not underestimate the power of our Order.
Arisen are not the only shields of the White
Dragon.

MsgJp: 竜に選ばれし者の活躍――見せてもらうぞ
MsgEn: Let's see what the dragon's chosen one can do.

MsgJp:
明け暮れる戦いの日々――
その先に平穏はあるのだろうか
MsgEn:
Days of endless battles -- Is there tranquility
beyond them?

MsgJp:
何が起ころうと動じない心
それだけは、覚者にもひけをとらん
MsgEn:
An unwavering heart no matter what happens, that
is something even the Arisen cannot match.

MsgJp:
身を挺し、人々と竜を守る――
その覚悟こそが白衛騎士団の矜持だ
MsgEn:
Risking your life, protecting people and dragons.
That determination is the pride of the White
Knights.

MsgJp:
ゲルト騎士団長が留守がちだから
忙しくてかなわんよ
MsgEn:
Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order, is often
absent. I am too busy to keep up.

MsgJp: 本当なら、そばで学びたいことがたくさんあるのだが
MsgEn:
There are many things that I need to discuss with
the prince. I can't afford to rest just yet.

MsgJp: はっ！　って、なんだ、あんたか
MsgEn: Huh! What, it's you?

MsgJp:
おお――顔は覚えたぞ
俺は騎士団の副長ハインツだ
今後も色々あるだろうが――よろしくな
MsgEn:
Oh—I remember your face. I am Vice Captain Heinz
of the Knight Order. There will be various things
happening in the future, but—please take care of
me.

MsgJp:
調査団と出かけた護衛隊の中には
俺の部下もいるんだ
もしあんたも行くなら、よろしく頼む
MsgEn:
Among the escort squad that went with the survey
team, There are also my subordinates. If you're
going too, I'll count on you.

MsgJp:
アークから戻らなかった部下がいるのだ
やりきれんな――
MsgEn:
There are subordinates who did not return from
the Ark. I can't stand it—

MsgJp:
あんたはなかなか見所があると
騎士団長から聞いている
あらためて、よろしくな
MsgEn:
You have quite a presence, as I've heard from the
Knight Commander. Once again, I look forward to
working with you.

MsgJp:
どうした？
顔に余裕があるな
ひと仕事終えたという感じだ
MsgEn:
What's up? You've got a look on your face like
you've done your job.

MsgJp:
どうも騒がしいが――
大きな命令が下りそうな気配だな
MsgEn:
Apparently there's a lot of noise-- Looks like
we're about to get a big order.

MsgJp:
いや、グリッテンの戦いは盛り上がったな
ついつい思い出してしまうよ
MsgEn:
No, the battle of Gritten was exciting. I can't
help but reminisce about it.

MsgJp:
犠牲は大きかったが――
けして無駄にはならない
俺はそう信じている
MsgEn:
Sacrifices were made, but they were not in vain.
I believe that.

MsgJp:
騎士団は欠員が補充されて
ほっとひと息だ
MsgEn:
The Knights have filled the vacancy. It's a
relief.

MsgJp:
そういえば最近あの子を見ないな
いつも元気な女の覚者だ
MsgEn:
By the way, I haven't seen that girl recently.
She's always been an energetic Arisen.

MsgJp:
そう、イリス――
騎士団の中でも人気があるんだ
MsgEn: Yes, Iris is popular even among the knights.

MsgJp:
ここのところオークもおとなしいな
ずっとこうだといいのだが――
MsgEn:
The orcs have been quiet as of late, too. I wish
it could be like this all the time—

MsgJp:
なんとか街を守り切ったが――
こんなに攻め込まれるとは前代未聞だ
MsgEn:
Somehow we managed to protect the town, but it's
unheard of to be invaded like this.

MsgJp:
戦況は一進一退という認識は
間違いのようだな
MsgEn:
The perception that the war is going back and
forth seems to be wrong.

MsgJp:
厳しい顔のレオを見たが――
何を始める気だ？
MsgEn:
I saw Leo with a stern look on his face-- What
are you trying to start?

MsgJp: これは見逃せないと思ってね――
MsgEn:
I think this is something you can't miss, you
know...

MsgJp:
近頃、騎士団に参加したい――
騎士になりたいという者が増えている
MsgEn:
Recently, more and more people want to join the
Order—want to become knights.

MsgJp:
頼もしいことのように思えるが
皆、危機を身近に感じているということでもある
いったい、これからどうなるんだろうな
MsgEn:
It seems like a reliable thing to do, but it also
means that everyone is feeling the crisis close at
hand. I wonder what in the world is going to
happen now?

MsgJp:
ミシアル様がひさしぶりに大階段を下りたと
うわさになっているぞ
MsgEn:
Rumor has it that Mysial has descended the grand
staircase for the first time in a long time.

MsgJp:
第二のアークにイリスが現れたってのは
本当なのか？
いったい何をしていたんだ？
MsgEn:
Is it true that Iris appeared in the second Ark?
What on earth was she doing?

MsgJp:
アークの破壊部隊が編成されるはずだから
わたしは志願するつもりだ
MsgEn:
Since the Ark's destruction squad is supposed to
be formed, I'm going to volunteer.

MsgJp:
うわさになっている覚者の討伐には
参加したくないからな
MsgEn:
I don't want to participate in the rumored
subjugation of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
わたしたちを責めたければ責めるがいい
しかし、街にほとんど被害はなかった
それは騎士団の奮闘によるものだ
MsgEn:
You are free to blame us.
However, there was little damage to the city,
thanks to the efforts of the Knight Order.

MsgJp:
巫女が連れ去られるのを黙って見ていた
わけではないんだ
MsgEn:
I didn't just silently watch as the woman was
abducted.

MsgJp:
ミシアルが自ら闇に身を投げ――
誘拐犯たるイリスはレオが討伐した
そのレオは神殿に戻っていない――
MsgEn:
Mysial threw herself into darkness— Iris, the
kidnapper, was defeated by Leo. But Leo has not
returned to the temple—

MsgJp:
ジョゼフとクラウスの意見は対立し――
白竜は相変わらずまどろみの中――
MsgEn:
Joseph and Klaus have conflicting opinions - The
White Dragon remains in a deep slumber.

MsgJp:
なあ、おれたちはこのままでいいのか？
どこで何をすればいいんだ？
MsgEn:
Hey, are we okay just like this? Where should we
go, and what should we do?

MsgJp:
騎士団長はレオが手を抜いたと主張している
ということは――
MsgEn:
The leader of the knights claims that Leo slacked
off which means—

MsgJp: はて、どういうことだ？
MsgEn: Well, what is this all about?

MsgJp:
レオとは戦いたくない
たとえ手加減されても俺は逃げる
MsgEn:
I don't want to fight Leo. Even if he takes it
easy on me I'll run.

MsgJp:
その代わり、見かけた魔物は片っ端から
切り捨ててやる
MsgEn:
Arisen, I will cut down every monster I see in my
way.

MsgJp:
最前線は譲ってやる
感謝するんだな
MsgEn:
I'll give you the front line. You should be
thankful.

MsgJp:
これまで幾つもの戦いがあったが――
騎士団と覚者がこれほど協力し合って
事にあたったことはなかったんじゃないかな
MsgEn:
There have been many battles so far, but the
Knights and the Arisen cooperating like this, I
don't think it has ever happened before.

MsgJp:
今この時、ここにいられることが
誇らしくてたまらないよ
MsgEn: I'm so proud to be here at this moment.

MsgJp:
ゲルト騎士団長と仲間たちを
よろしく頼んだぞ
MsgEn:
I entrusted Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order,
and his comrades to you.

MsgJp:
正直言って、覚者の中にあんたがいるのは
助かるよ
MsgEn:
To be honest, it's reassuring that you're one of
the Arisen.

MsgJp:
レオは嫌いじゃないけど、なんだか
やりにくくてさ
MsgEn:
I don't dislike Leo, but somehow he's difficult
to work with.

MsgJp: 最早、話すことなどない
MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.

MsgJp:
相互理解など凡夫の夢――
愚かなことよ
MsgEn:
Mutual understanding is an ordinary man's dream—
It's foolishness.

MsgJp:
悔はない
いまは決意あるのみ
MsgEn:
No regrets.
Now we just have to be determined.

MsgJp: 動き始めたものは、止められない
MsgEn:
Once something starts moving, it cannot be
stopped.

MsgJp: これ以上、互いに何を得るというのだ
MsgEn: What more do we have to gain from each other?

MsgJp:
覚者――
いびつな存在だ
MsgEn: Arisen - what a depressing existence.

MsgJp:
錬金の術をもってしても時は戻せない
ならば――
過去を悔やむ時間など無駄だ
MsgEn:
Even with the art of alchemy, time cannot be
reversed. If that is the case―― Regretting the
past is a waste of time.

MsgJp:
戦うのであれば――
死を覚悟したまえ
MsgEn:
If you fight--
be prepared to die.

MsgJp:
ここを、全ての古きものの終の地としよう
そして新たに、世界を描き変えるのだ
MsgEn:
Let this be the end of all that is old and let us
redraw the world anew!

MsgJp:
同意など求めぬ
ただ受け入れたまえ、この浄化を
MsgEn:
I don't ask for your consent. Just accept this
cleansing.

MsgJp: ほう？　話したいというわけか
MsgEn: Oh? So you want to talk, is that it?

MsgJp:
おや――少々意外ではあるな
錬金を忌む世で育った君が
《アルケミスト》に興味を持つとはね
MsgEn:
Well--it's somewhat surprising that you, who grew
up in a world that abhors alchemy, would be
interested in becoming an Alchemist.

MsgJp:
正直に言って、興味本位は困る
これからのわたしの立場もあるからね
MsgEn:
To be honest, I'm troubled by curiosity for
curiosity's sake. Because it also involves my
future position, you know.

MsgJp:
加えて、思い違いをしてもらっては
やはり困るが――
MsgEn:
In addition, if you could misunderstand, that
would still be troublesome...

MsgJp:
いやいや、すまない
どうも警戒が先に立ってしまってね
MsgEn:
No, no, I'm sorry. I was just being cautious,
that's all.

MsgJp:
君なら問題ないだろう
課題さえ乗り越えてくれれば
喜んで指導させてもらうよ
MsgEn:
If it's you, there should be no problem. As long
as you can overcome the challenges, I would be
happy to guide you.

MsgJp:
ほほう――課題を乗り越えたのか
君は白竜がかつて封じた錬金術を
覚者でありながら、学ぼうというんだね
MsgEn:
Oh, I see—have you overcome the challenge? You,
as an Arisen, wish to learn the alchemy that the
White Dragon once sealed away.

MsgJp:
嬉しくもあり、危うくもあり――
だが君が選んだのなら
私はその選択を尊重するよ
MsgEn:
With the same purpose, traveling with fellow
comrades and walking together. Well, isn't it
wonderful?

MsgJp: では、《アルケミスト》として共に歩もう
MsgEn: Well then, let's walk together as 'Alchemists.'

MsgJp:
錬金術とはそもそも、人の論理を用い
人の為に導く学問
理との共存も、君ならできるかもしれないね
MsgEn:
Alchemy is, in the first place, the study of
using human logic to guide people. You might be
able to coexist with reason, too.

MsgJp:
なかなかどうして、覚えが早いな、君は
もう中等レベルの錬金術は十分に
使いこなせているようだね
MsgEn:
You're quite remarkable, your ability to learn
quickly. It seems like you're already proficient
in intermediate level alchemy.

MsgJp:
ならば、もう少し上級の技に手を出して
みてもいいかもしれない
こういう技だが、どうだい、やれそうかな？
MsgEn:
In that case, you might consider delving into
more advanced techniques. How about this
technique? Do you think you can handle it?

MsgJp:
ううむ、末恐ろしいな、君は
この短期間でこれほどまでに成長するとは
わたし、ディアマンテスでさえ――
――いや、やめておこう
MsgEn:
Hmm, it's quite frightening how much you've grown
in such a short period of time. Even I, Diamantes-
No, let's not go there.

MsgJp:
いいかね、錬金術は論理の結晶
自然なるものに、人為的に別の特性を
組み合わせ変化させる術だ
MsgEn:
Listen, alchemy is the crystallization of logic.
It is the art of combining and transforming the
natural with artificial characteristics.

MsgJp:
君の意思、君が紡いだ論理こそが
技の要となる、それを常に思い出し
これからの技に向きあいなさい
MsgEn:
Your will, the logic you weave is the key to
technique.
Always remember that and face the future of your
art.

MsgJp:
錬金術の中には、術の論理を戦いの技
として応用したものがある
自身の生命力を媒介に、物質を生成・変換し
組み変える技だ
MsgEn:
Wow, you stink. You certainly smell the part,
Arisen, but it couldn't hurt to take a bath every
now and then.

MsgJp:
《アルケミスト》として君が錬金術を学ぶ
なら、そちらの分野がいいだろう
MsgEn: As an "alchemist", you should study alchemy.

MsgJp:
溶命炉の力を見たのなら知っているとおり
命のエネルギーは人も魔も惹きつける
――あれに比べればもちろん、規模こそ小さいがね
MsgEn:
If you have seen the power of the Furnace, as you
know,
the energy of life attracts both humans and
demons.
Of course, compared to that, it is small in
scale, but you know.

MsgJp:
力の流れと理論を知り、意思によって自在に
操ることができれば、君が生成するエネルギーは
エリクシルと交わることで
敵を蝕む毒にも、友を守る薬にも変わるだろう
MsgEn:
If you know the flow and theory of power, and can
manipulate it at will, the energy you generate
will intersect with the elixir and turn into a
poison that will weaken your enemies or a medicine
that will protect your friends.

MsgJp:
錬金術を扱う上で、もっとも大切なことは
やはり、錬成物質とエリクシルの変換だろう
MsgEn:
When dealing with alchemy, the most important
thing remains the transformation of alchemized
substances and elixirs.

MsgJp:
エリクシルとは属性の性質そのもの
錬成物質はエリクシルと結合し発動
することで、様々な効果を帯びる
MsgEn:
Elixirs are substances that combine with the
attributes themselves and activate, giving various
effects.

MsgJp:
どの戦いでどのエリクシルを用いるかが
戦いの結果にも大きく影響するのだ
MsgEn:
The choice of which Elixirs to use in each battle
greatly affects the outcome of the fight.

MsgJp:
君は《アルケミスト》として学んでいるのだね
調子はどうだい？
術の仕組みが解ってくれば
おのずと慣れてくるだろう
MsgEn:
You are studying as an Alchemist, right?
How are you doing?
Once you understand the mechanism of magic, You
will naturally get used to it.

MsgJp:
――そうだね、ジョブレベル１８と
いったところだろうか
MsgEn: --I'd say job level 18.

MsgJp:
それくらい基礎を修めたなら
次の段階に進んでもいいだろう
MsgEn:
If you have mastered the basics to that extent,
you can proceed to the next stage.

MsgJp:
もっとも、その前に神殿で君の戦いぶりを
日頃見ているであろう者から
本当にアルケミストを続けるべきか
同意はもらっておいた方がいい
MsgEn:
However, it would be wise to obtain the approval
of those who have been observing your battle
prowess at the temple before continuing as an
Alchemist.

MsgJp:
君がアルケミストとしてさらなるものを求め
君の戦いぶりを見ている者も許すのであれば――
その時はわたしが直接手ほどきをしよう
MsgEn:
If you, as an Alchemist, seek something even
greater.
And if those who witness your battles are willing
to forgive—
Then, I shall personally guide you.

MsgJp:
ほほう――
君は白竜がかつて封じた錬金術を
覚者でありながら、究めようというんだね
MsgEn:
Oh, I see— You, as an Arisen, wish to learn the
alchemy that the White Dragon once sealed away.

MsgJp:
嬉しくもあり、危うくもあり――
だが君が選んだのなら
私はその選択を尊重するよ
MsgEn:
With happiness and uncertainty intermingled--
But if that's what you've chosen,
I will respect your decision.

MsgJp:
錬金術とはそもそも、人の論理を用い
人の為に導く学問
理との共存も、君ならできるかもしれないね
MsgEn:
Alchemy is, in the first place, the study of
using human logic to guide people.
You might be able to coexist with reason, too.

MsgJp:
さて、これまで君が学んできたものを基礎とすると
これから私が教えるのは応用編だな
さらに深く論理を知り、属性と物質の
精――エリクシルの本質に迫る
MsgEn:
Well, based on what you have learned so far, what
I will teach you next is the advanced edition.
Delve deeper into logic, the essence of attributes
and materials, the essence of Elixirs.

MsgJp:
その理解と転化、そして組み換えこそが
《アルケミスト》の理
MsgEn:
And thus, understanding, transformation, and
recombination are the true essence of the
Alchemist's order.

MsgJp:
さぁ、さっそく課題を出そう
君がその一端に触れてくれることを願うよ
MsgEn:
Now, let's promptly submit the assignment. I hope
you can lend a hand in that regard.

MsgJp:
ふむ、君のアルケミストとしての研鑽には
目を見張るものがある
十分応用を学べるレベルになっているようだね
MsgEn:
Hmm, your dedication to studying as an Alchemist
is truly remarkable. It seems you have reached a
level where you can learn and apply skills
extensively.

MsgJp:
もしも、君が錬金の道の奥深くへと
歩みを進めようというならば
わたしが直接手ほどきしたいところだが――
そうするべきかどうか、判断が難しい
MsgEn:
If you are willing to take a step deeper into the
path of alchemy, I would love to teach you
directly--
but it's hard to decide if I should.

MsgJp:
神殿で君の訓練や戦いぶりを見てきた者
が賛成するなら、わたしは構わないが
MsgEn:
If those who have witnessed your training and
battles at the temple agree, I have no objections.

MsgJp: なるほど、覚者か――
MsgEn: I see, an Arisen, huh?

MsgJp: 予断を許さない状況のようだね
MsgEn:
It seems like a situation that doesn't allow for
any speculation.

MsgJp:
君のことは気になるが――
余計な詮索は止めにしておこう――互いにね
MsgEn:
I'm curious about you--
but let's not pry too much into each other's
affairs--we're both here for each other.

MsgJp:
生きていればこんな体験ができる
ああ、やはり人生は素晴らしいね
MsgEn:
If you are alive, you can have such experiences,
Ah, indeed life is wonderful.

MsgJp: 過ぎたるは及ばざるがごとし、か
MsgEn: Excessive is as bad as useless.

MsgJp:
なぜ、こうなってしまったのか――
いつか明らかにしてみせよう
ああ、もちろん、楽しみで仕方がないよ
MsgEn:
How did this happen--
I'll reveal it to you one day.
Oh, and of course, I'm looking forward to it!

MsgJp:
あの日――黄金竜と白竜の戦い以来
我々が過ごしてきたこの時間を――
わたしが解き明かしてみせよう
MsgEn:
Since that day - the battle between the Golden
Dragon and hours.
This time we have spent, I will unravel it for
you.

MsgJp:
過ちは、誰にでもある
それを正す勇気こそ、尊いのだ
MsgEn:
Everyone makes mistakes. It is the courage to
correct them that is precious.

MsgJp:
すべてを知りつくしたつもりでも
まだこうして予測不能な出来事が起こる
うれしくもあり――恐ろしくもあり――だね
MsgEn:
Even if you think you know everything, unexpected
events can still happen. It's both exciting and
terrifying, isn't it?

MsgJp: ああ、クラウスの友達か、どうしたんだい？
MsgEn: Ah, Klaus's friend, what's up?

MsgJp:
錬金術師が始めたことは
錬金術師が終わらせる
MsgEn:
What the alchemist started, the alchemist will
finish.

MsgJp: それが我々の覚悟だ
MsgEn: That is our Arisen's resolve.

MsgJp: ディアマンテスは錬金術師の面汚し――
MsgEn: Diamantes is a disgrace to the alchemists.

MsgJp:
奴を倒せる日が来ようとは
ああ、堪え忍んだ甲斐があったというものだ
MsgEn:
I never thought I'd see the day he'd be defeated.
Oh, it's been worth it.

MsgJp:
神殿の連中によろしく伝えてくれ
心の準備ができたら、わたしの方から
挨拶に行きたいと思う
MsgEn:
Please convey my regards to the temple personnel.
Once I am mentally prepared, I would like to go
and greet them.

MsgJp: さあ、今は早く帰った方がいい
MsgEn: Now, it's better to go home quickly.

MsgJp:
ああ、その話だな
いいだろう
MsgEn: Ah, that story, right? That's fine.

MsgJp:
立場上、ひいきするわけにはいかないが
私が最も愛するジョブは当然《ファイター》だ
MsgEn:
On principle, I cannot show favoritism, but my
most beloved job is, of course, "Fighter."

MsgJp:
己が身を敵前にさらし、盾と剣を巧みに操り
それはまるで舞の如く――
MsgEn:
Exposing oneself to the enemy and deftly wielding
shield and sword. It's like a dance—.

MsgJp:
突破口を開いて敵陣深く入り込み
本陣をかく乱する――
ふふ、敵が驚き、呆ける顔を間近で見られるのは
《ファイター》だけだ！
MsgEn:
Opening a breakthrough and infiltrating deep into
enemy territory
Disrupting their main force -
Hehe, being able to see the surprised and
bewildered faces up close
Is something only a Fighter can do!

MsgJp:
おまえもなかなか腕を上げ、《ファイター》と
しての自覚を身に付けつつあるようだな
MsgEn:
You have also been improving quite a bit and seem
to be gaining a sense of being a Fighter.

MsgJp:
――よし、私から修練を課してやろう
そして今以上に技を磨き、一流の剣士となれ！
MsgEn:
Alright, I will impose training upon you And
thus, polish your skills even more, become a
first-class swordsman!

MsgJp:
よし、いいだろう
《ファイター》を名乗ることを許そう
MsgEn:
Okay, fine. I'll allow you to call yourself a
Fighter.

MsgJp:
まぁいい
新たな剣技を教えてやる
MsgEn:
Well, never mind. I will teach you a new sword
technique.

MsgJp:
今以上に強くなりたければ、修練を重ね
さらに技を会得するのだな
MsgEn:
If you want to become stronger than you are now,
train harder and further hone your skills.

MsgJp:
ほう――、かなり腕を上げたようだな
今のおまえなら、あの技も使い
こなせるだろう
MsgEn:
Well, you've really improved your skills, haven't
you?
With your current ability, you should be able to
use that technique and master it.

MsgJp:
剣の役割とは相手を斬ること
だが、それは道具としての役目であって
剣の本質ではない
MsgEn:
The role of a sword is to slash the opponent.
However, that is only its function as a tool.
It is not the essence of a sword.

MsgJp:
敵を削ぎ己を活かす
それこそが本質だ
勝敗、生死は全て、その結果
付いてくるものにすぎない
MsgEn:
Reduce your enemy and make the most of yourself;
That's the essence.
Winning and losing, life and death, are all just
the result of what comes with it.

MsgJp: それを心に留め、この技を修得するがいい
MsgEn:
Remember that in your heart, you should strive to
master this technique.

MsgJp:
知っての通り《ファイター》の武器は剣と盾
そして己自身の肉体だ
MsgEn:
As you know, the weapon of a Fighter is a sword
and a shield and their own body.

MsgJp:
敵を討つ、それがファイターに課された最大の
役割だが、ただ攻撃をすればよいというわけではない
自身を守り、先陣に居続けることが仲間を救い
ひいては勝利につながるのだ
MsgEn:
The greatest role imposed on a Fighter is to
defeat enemies, but it's not simply about
attacking. Protecting oneself and staying at the
forefront can save comrades and ultimately lead to
victory.

MsgJp:
攻守どちらをおろそかにしても、一流のファイター
とは言えないというわけだ
MsgEn:
Regardless of whether you neglect offense or
defense, it means that you cannot be called a
first-class Fighter.

MsgJp:
敵と斬り結ぶ中、技術は後からでも付いてくる
ファイターとなるなら、まずは剣と盾が身体の一部と
思えるようになるまで振るい、感覚をなじませろ
MsgEn:
With cutting with the enemy, the skill comes
later.
If you want to be a fighter, first swing your
sword and shield until you feel like they are part
of your body
and familiarize yourself with them.

MsgJp:
それ以上のことは、おまえが一人前のファイターに
なった頃に教えてやる
MsgEn:
I will teach you more when you become a
full-fledged Fighter.

MsgJp:
盾は、身を守るだけのものではないぞ
使いようによっては敵の攻撃をいなし
反撃の足掛かりとすることもできる
MsgEn:
The shield is not just for self-defense.
Depending on how it is used, it can block the
enemy's attacks and serve as a foothold for
counterattacks.

MsgJp:
攻撃を受ける直前、敵の体重がかかる
わずかな瞬間を見定めろ
MsgEn:
Just before receiving an attack, determine the
moment when the enemy's weight is applied.

MsgJp:
そこを捉えれば反動はそっくり相手に
返り、態勢を崩すことができるだろう
MsgEn:
If you seize that moment, the recoil will be
completely returned to the opponent
, and you will be able to disrupt their stance.

MsgJp:
《クリティカルタイミング》――
ちまたではそんな呼び方をしているらしい
覚えておくことだ
MsgEn:
《Critical Timing》――
It seems that is what they call it.
Remember that.

MsgJp:
ほう――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？
MsgEn: Oh... Do you want me to teach you a lesson?

MsgJp:
なら少なくとも《ファイター》となり
ジョブレベル１８以上の経験を
積むことだな
MsgEn:
Then, let us send you to the past. Oh, Arisen of
the White Dragon, may fortune favor you.

MsgJp:
その後、訓練官レンテンの許可が
出たなら考えてやろう
話はそれからだ
MsgEn:
After that, I'll think about it if the Training
Officer Renton gives the green light. Then we'll
talk about it.

MsgJp:
あぁ――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？
なるほど確かに相応の腕になったようだ
MsgEn:
Oh—you want me to train you? Well, you certainly
look like you're up to snuff.

MsgJp:
だが何事にも順序がある
まずは神殿の訓練官レンテンに
ジョブの基本を修めた報告くらいはしてこい
MsgEn:
But there's an order to everything.
First, you should at least report to Lenten, the
temple trainer,
that you've mastered the basics of the job.

MsgJp:
正式に教えを請いにきたならば
稽古に付き合ってやろう
MsgEn:
If you have come to formally seek knowledge,
I shall accompany you in your training.

MsgJp:
戦術を指南してほしいのか？
ならば実戦に勝る教えはないぞ
MsgEn:
You want me to teach you tactics? Then there's no
better way to learn than through combat.

MsgJp:
戦いは勝つためにするのだ
そのための努力、怠るな
MsgEn:
We fight in order to win. Do not neglect the
effort required for that.

MsgJp:
すまないな
世間話というものが苦手なんだ
MsgEn:
I'm sorry,
but I'm not good at small talk

MsgJp:
集中だ！
戦闘態勢は寝所でも解くな！
MsgEn:
Concentration! Don't let your guard down even in
your sleeping quarters!

MsgJp:
覚者とは何か――
いろいろな考えがあるだろうが
自分は、戦人（いくさびと）だと信じている
MsgEn:
What is an Arisen? There may be various thoughts,
but I believe I am a warrior.

MsgJp:
こう戦闘続きでは疲れもたまるな――
キノザでゆっくりしたいものだ
MsgEn:
I'm getting tired after all these battles-- I'd
like to relax in Kinoza.

MsgJp:
魔物より恐ろしい敵の名を教えてやろう
それは――油断、慢心、怠慢だ
MsgEn:
I will teach you the name of an enemy more
frightening than monsters. It is--carelessness,
complacency, and negligence.

MsgJp:
どれほどの敵を倒せば
この地に平穏が訪れるのか――
こんなことを思うとは――老いたか
MsgEn:
How many enemies must I defeat for peace to come
to this land? To think such a thing... have I
grown old?

MsgJp:
勝利の秘策？
そんなものがあるなら、そもそも戦争など起こらない
MsgEn:
The secret strategy for victory? If such a thing
exists, wars wouldn't happen in the first place.

MsgJp:
価値を問う前に、黙って守れ
失って後悔したくなければな
MsgEn:
Before you question the value, shut up and
protect unless you want to lose it and regret it.

MsgJp: 何？　拠点防衛に関する提案？
MsgEn: What? A proposal regarding base defense?

MsgJp:
オークどもをぶっ倒し、追いだしても
臭いはしばらく残るんだ
たまらん――くそっ！
MsgEn:
Even if you knock the orcs off and drive them out
the smell lingers for a while. I can't stand it --
damn it!

MsgJp: 魔物掃除に来たのか？
MsgEn: Did you come to exterminate the enemy?

MsgJp:
だったら遠慮はいらない
砦の外でひと暴れしてきてくれ
MsgEn:
Then you should at least become a 《Fighter》 and
have at least 18 job levels of experience.

MsgJp:
アルヴァーと会ったらしいな
だったら、こんなところにいないで
さっさと契約をすませたらどうだ？
MsgEn:
I heard you met Alvar. If that's the case, why
don't you finish the contract quickly? You
shouldn't be here instead.

MsgJp:
どうした？
レオの話し相手は退屈か？
MsgEn: What's the matter? Bored of talking to Leo?

MsgJp:
だったら遠慮することはない
思う存分魔物と戦ってくれ
MsgEn:
In that case, there's no need to hold back. Fight
monsters to your heart's content.

MsgJp: おや――また来たのか
MsgEn: Oh, you've come back again.

MsgJp:
ひまだと言うなら、遠慮はいらない
このあたりの魔物を片っ端から倒してくれ
まったくどこからわいてくるのやら――だな
MsgEn:
If you say you have free time, there's no need to
hold back.
Please defeat all the enemies around here one by
one.
I wonder where they're coming from.

MsgJp:
オークどもの行動様式が明らかに変化している
そちらも警戒を怠るなとレオとゲルト団長に
伝えてくれ
MsgEn:
The behavior patterns of the Orcs have clearly
changed. Please also inform Captain Leo and Gerd
to stay alert.

MsgJp:
アークとやらが出現してから
オークの様子がおかしい――
MsgEn: Since The Ark appeared, the Orcs seem strange.

MsgJp: そう感じたのは自分の勘違いか――
MsgEn: Did I misunderstand it -

MsgJp: 神殿の様子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How is the temple?

MsgJp:
ひまそうな覚者がいたら
訓練がてら顔を出すように伝えてくれ
MsgEn:
If there are any idle Arisen, please tell them to
come and train with me as a practice session.

MsgJp:
そう焦るな
まずはレオ統率と話してからだ
MsgEn:
Don't rush like that. First, talk to Leo for
guidance.

MsgJp:
モゴックの様子を覚えているか？
あいつが持っていたものは――なんだ？
MsgEn:
Do you remember what Mogok looked like? What that
guy had--what was it?

MsgJp:
オークはズールとかいう魔物と手を組んだ
このところ感じていた違和感の正体は
それだったようだ
MsgEn:
The Orc has formed an alliance with a creature
called Zuhl. The true identity of the discomfort I
had been feeling lately seems to be that.

MsgJp:
わたしはバカなオークと毎日戦っているのが
嫌いじゃなかった
正直、生きている実感があった
MsgEn:
I didn't mind fighting against stupid orcs every
day. Honestly, it made me feel alive.

MsgJp:
ところがあのズールがオークを変えてしまった
小賢しい――薄汚い魔物め――
もう憎しみしかない
MsgEn:
However, that Zuhl changed the orcs into a
cunning, filthy enemy... There is only hatred
left.

MsgJp:
憎しみを抱えながら戦うのは――
きっと悲しいぞ？
だが、これからはそういう時代なのかもな
MsgEn:
Fighting with hate-- sure is sad, isn't it? But
maybe that's the way it's going to be from now on.

MsgJp:
イリスに会ったらたまには顔を出すように
伝えてくれ
MsgEn:
If you meet Iris, please tell her to show her
face once in a while.

MsgJp: もしやおまえはわたしと同類ではないのか？
MsgEn: Are you not like me?

MsgJp:
小ぎれいな神殿よりも最前線の砦が好き――
着飾った街の住人よりも
薄汚れた鎧カブトの戦士を愛おしく思う――
MsgEn:
I prefer the frontline fortress over the tidy
temple――
I cherish the dirty armored soldier more than the
well-dressed residents of the city――

MsgJp: ならば遠慮せず、いつでもここに来い
MsgEn:
Then you don't need to hold back. Please go wild
outside the fortress.

MsgJp: 不覚だ――面目ない――
MsgEn: I am not Arisen - I am ashamed -

MsgJp:
しかし、案ずるな
わたしはもう未来を見ている
もうオークの好きにはさせないさ
MsgEn:
But don't fret.
I've already seen the future.
I won't let the orcs have their way anymore.

MsgJp:
神殿はどうだ？
ここの体制の立て直しが一段落ついたら
顔を出そうと思っているんだ
MsgEn:
How's the temple going? I'm thinking of showing
up when I'm done rebuilding this place.

MsgJp: うわさでは神殿の雰囲気が変わったのだとか
MsgEn:
Rumor has it that the atmosphere of the temple
has changed.

MsgJp:
悲壮感に満ちているらしいな
正直、行く気が失せる
MsgEn:
It seems filled with a sense of tragedy.
Honestly, I lose my motivation to go.

MsgJp:
ここにいても白竜の目覚めは感じられるんだ
だから、わたしもおまえと同じ時に
竜力を受け取っている
MsgEn:
I can feel the awakening of the White Dragon even
here.
So I also receive Dragon Force at the same time
as you.

MsgJp:
そして、その恩に報いることを考える
ああ――いつも考えている
MsgEn:
And think about repaying the favor.
Oh--I think about it all the time!

MsgJp:
ミシアルが謁見の間から出たらしいな
もっと引っ張り出してやるといい
MsgEn:
Mysial seems to have come out of the Audience
Chamber. It would be good to get them out even
more.

MsgJp:
――いや、誘っても無理か
――うん、無理だな
MsgEn:
――No, it would be impossible to invite her.
――Yeah, it's impossible.

MsgJp:
最前線だったこの砦も
今では時折小競り合いが起こる程度だ
MsgEn:
This fort, which used to be the front line,
now sees only occasional skirmishes.

MsgJp:
殺気で肌がヒリヒリ傷むような戦場――
そんな場所を探して旅に出ようか
――最近、そんなことを思うんだ
MsgEn:
A battlefield where the skin stings with a
killing intent - Should I search for such a place
and embark on a journey? Lately, I've been
thinking about such things.

MsgJp:
イリスの行方を知っているか？
身を隠すように言ってやった方が
いいかもしれないぞ？
MsgEn:
Do you know where Iris is? It might be better to
tell her to hide.

MsgJp:
ふん――そうか
さすがレオだ
MsgEn: Hmph――so that's it. As expected of Leo.

MsgJp:
神殿が大変だと聞いているが――
おまえは戻った方が良くはないか？
MsgEn:
I heard that the temple is in trouble— Wouldn't
it be better for you to come back?

MsgJp: ここの指揮は部下に任せようと思う
MsgEn:
I think I'll leave the command here to my
subordinates.

MsgJp:
引き継ぎが終わり次第わたしも神殿へ行く
向こうで会おうではないか
MsgEn:
Once the handover is complete, I will also go to
the temple.
Let's meet there, shall we?

MsgJp:
レオのことは心配するな
すべて良かれと思ってしていることだろう
MsgEn:
Don't worry about Leo. I'm sure he's doing
everything for the best.

MsgJp: 行動が愚かだが――昔からだ
MsgEn:
My actions may be foolish, but it has always been
this way.

MsgJp:
くそっ――
このあたりの魔物が騒がしくなってな
なかなか離れることができないのだ
MsgEn:
Damn it―― The enemies around here are getting
noisy. I can't seem to get away easily.

MsgJp:
ここにはわたしがいる
――わかるか？
MsgEn: Here I am --you know what I mean?

MsgJp:
ここの守りは堅い――そういうことだ
思う存分、戦ってこい
MsgEn:
The defense here is strong—That's what I'm
talking about. Go ahead and fight to your heart's
content.

MsgJp:
報せを聞いて駆けつけたぞ
おまえは最前線にいたのだろう？
ご苦労だったな
MsgEn:
I rushed over upon hearing the report. Were you
at the front line? You've worked hard.

MsgJp:
今度手柄話を聞かせてくれ
盛大にうらやましがってやろう
MsgEn:
Tell me your achievements next time. I'll
celebrate them with great envy.

MsgJp:
ん？
俺と仲良くなりたいっての？
MsgEn: Hmm? You want to be friends with me?

MsgJp:
世間話ねえ
そんな気分じゃないんだよな――
MsgEn: Chatting is not on my mind right now—

MsgJp:
なああんた、ひまなら俺と――
あ、ひまじゃない？　そりゃ失礼
MsgEn:
Hey, if you're free, how about spending some time
with me... Oh, you're not? Well, that was rude.

MsgJp:
自由に生きるってのは
思ったほど楽じゃないんだな、これが
MsgEn:
Living free is not as easy as I thought it would
be.

MsgJp:
あんた、この世界がどうなるのが理想？
なーんて、俺も考えたことないけどな
MsgEn:
What would you like the world to be like?
I've never really thought about it.

MsgJp:
苦難の時代だなんて言うやつもいるけど
俺は結構楽しんでるよ
MsgEn:
Some say it's a hard time. I'm having a pretty
good time.

MsgJp:
まいったまいった――
次から次へと魔物がよぉ
MsgEn:
I'm in trouble, I'm in trouble--
Enemies keep coming one after another.

MsgJp:
覚者のことを便利屋みたいに
思ってる奴、いるよな――
MsgEn:
There are people who think of Arisen as a
handyman, right?

MsgJp:
俺、聞き流すの得意でさ――
それでもいいなら、どうぞ
――さあ、話せ！
MsgEn:
I'm good at just listening, you know-- If that's
really okay, then go ahead. Now, speak up!

MsgJp:
昨日と違う今日、今日と違う明日――
世界はその繰り返しでできてるんだ
――てな
MsgEn:
Today is different from yesterday, and tomorrow
will be different from today―― The world is made
up of such repetitions ―― That's what it means.

MsgJp:
一期一会――いい言葉だね
俺、商品、客――
すべての出会いが、そうなんだな
MsgEn:
Once-in-a-lifetime encounter――That's a nice phrase
Me, the product, the client――
Every encounter is like that

MsgJp:
あんたもいっぱしの覚者を気取るなら
身につけるモノは厳選しなよ
どうだい、ひとつ見繕ってやろうか？
MsgEn:
If you're going to pretend to be an Arisen, be
selective about what you wear. How about I pick
something for you?

MsgJp:
こんな時代なのに商品が行き来しているのは
凄いことだ――
俺たち、誇っていいと思うぞ
MsgEn:
It's amazing how much product is coming and going
in these times-- I think we should all be proud!

MsgJp:
金なら、余ってるんじゃないのか？
安くするぜ、取引していきなよ
MsgEn:
I'm sure you've got plenty of money. I'll give
you a discount. Make a deal with me.

MsgJp: よぉ、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
その臭い――戦う覚者という感じで
悪くはないが、日常も大切にな
MsgEn:
Wow, you stink. You certainly smell the part,
Arisen, but it couldn't hurt to take a bath every
now and then.

MsgJp:
時間があるなら世のため人のために
駆け回るのも悪くないぞ
金にもなるしな
MsgEn:
If you have time, it's not a bad idea to run
around for the sake of the world and for others.
It can even bring you money as well.

MsgJp:
いろんな覚者がいる
いろんな生き方がある
とても自然なことだと思うね
MsgEn:
There are various Arisen.
There are various ways of living.
