I think it's a very natural thing.

MsgJp:
へえ――なんだか見違えたな
一皮むけたってやつだ
MsgEn:
Oh, wow—something about you has really changed.
It's like you've shed a whole new skin.

MsgJp:
珍しいものを見つけたら声をかけてくれよな
場合によっては高値で引き取って
やれるかもしれないぜ？
MsgEn:
If you find something rare, please let me know.
Depending on the situation, I might be able to
take it off your hands for a high price, you know?

MsgJp:
アークでは、いや、参った――
でも、探せば珍品があったかもな
MsgEn:
The Ark, no, I give up—But if you look, there
might be rare items.

MsgJp:
遠出したのか？
このあたりにはない花とか素材とか――
MsgEn:
Did you go far? Maybe you found flowers or
materials that aren't found around here.

MsgJp:
損をすることはないから
目についたら持ち帰るといい
MsgEn:
You've got nothing to lose, so take it home if
you see it.

MsgJp:
戦っても空しい――金を儲けても空しい――
だが、どんな時でも続く覚者人生――
楽しまなくちゃ損だぜ？
MsgEn:
Even if you fight, it's in vain―― even if you
make money, it's in vain―― But the life of the
Arisen continues no matter what―― You have to
enjoy it, or else it's a loss, you know?

MsgJp:
心配してくれる友達がいるなんて幸せ者だ
――イリスがそれを忘れていなければ
何も問題は起こらないさ
MsgEn:
I am a lucky person to have friends who worry
about me. - As long as Iris doesn't forget that,
nothing will go wrong.

MsgJp:
謁見の間の様子はどうだ？
俺はしばらく距離を置くことにするよ
MsgEn:
How is the situation in the Audience Chamber? I'm
going to keep my distance for a while.

MsgJp:
凄いことが始まるらしいな
ひさしぶりに大階段を登ろうか――
MsgEn:
I hear great things are about to begin. Let's
climb the grand staircase for the first time in a
while—

MsgJp:
戦うだけが覚者じゃない――
とはいえ、かつてないほど戦いの機運が
盛りあがっている――
MsgEn:
Being an Arisen is not just about fighting--
However, the momentum for battle has never been
higher--

MsgJp: どんな立ち位置をとるべきか――悩むね
MsgEn: I'm not sure what position I should take.

MsgJp: イリスの顔を見ないけど何か知ってるか？
MsgEn: I don't see Iris around, do you know anything?

MsgJp:
イリスのことは聞いた
友達ではあるが――
MsgEn: I heard about Iris. She is a friend, but - -

MsgJp:
彼女との付き合いが長い
レオに任せるのが一番だな
MsgEn:
It'd be best to leave it to Leo, who has a long
history with her.

MsgJp:
これまでになかったことが立て続けに起こると
何に対しても集中できなくなる
我ながら修行が足りないぜ
MsgEn:
When unprecedented events continue to occur, I
cannot concentrate on anything.
I am lacking in self-discipline!

MsgJp: 長命のエルフが持つ知識は値千金――
MsgEn:
The knowledge that long-lived Elves possess is
invaluable.

MsgJp:
なんてな
損得抜きで、仲良くしたかった
MsgEn:
What a pity.
I wanted to get along with you, no gain or loss.

MsgJp:
白竜が元気だったら、俺は覚者じゃなかった
たとえエルフが死のうが――
なんとも思わなかっただろう
MsgEn:
If the white dragon had been healthy, I wouldn't
have been an Arisen. Even if the elf had died— I
wouldn't have cared.

MsgJp: ――人生の巡り合わせは不思議だよな
MsgEn: Life's encounters are strange, aren't they?

MsgJp:
新たなアーク――
ほとぼりがさめたら個人的に調査もいいな
MsgEn:
A new Ark... It would be nice to personally
investigate once the heat dies down.

MsgJp:
見たぞ――
巫女と歩くなんてどんな気分だ？
MsgEn:
I saw it-- How does it feel to walk with a
priestess?

MsgJp: 覚者のことは覚者が始末をつける――
MsgEn:
The Arisen has to take care of the Arisen's
business.

MsgJp:
昔からの習慣だ
覚悟だけはしておこう
MsgEn: It's an old habit. Let's just be prepared.

MsgJp:
しばらくここにいる
同志に向ける武器は持っていないからな
MsgEn:
I'll be here for a while, as I don't have any
weapons to aim at comrades.

MsgJp: 同志に向ける武器はない――
MsgEn: There are no weapons for comrades-in-arms -

MsgJp:
甘いことを言っている場合じゃないのか
くそっ！
MsgEn: You can't be so naive. Damn!

MsgJp: 《謁見の間》はどんな様子だ？
MsgEn: What's going on in the audience chamber?

MsgJp:
さぞ――いや、やめておこう
想像が当たったところでうれしくもなんともない
MsgEn:
Surely - No, let's leave it. Even if my
imagination was correct, it wouldn't make me
happy.

MsgJp:
みんな遠征に夢中になっているようだが
ここの安全が保証されたわけではあるまい？
MsgEn:
Everyone seems to be preoccupied with the
expedition. How can we be assured of the safety of
this place?

MsgJp:
というわけで、こんな言い方はらしくないが――
俺に任せてくれ
MsgEn:
So, although it may not be the most appropriate
way to say it—Leave it to me.

MsgJp:
メルゴダの様子はどうなんだ？
戦いで忙しいかもしれないが
逸品珍品を見逃すなよ？
MsgEn:
How's it going in Mergoda? You may be busy
fighting the battle, but don't miss the gems and
curiosities, okay?

MsgJp:
結局これは過去との戦いだったというわけか――
いや、ずっと続いていたわけだから
まだ過去にはなっていない――
MsgEn:
In the end, this was a battle with the past, so
to speak―― No, because it has been continuing for
a long time, it has not become the past yet――

MsgJp:
面倒だな――おまえの手で
過去にしてやるといい
MsgEn:
It's troublesome... It would be good for you to
make a thing of the past with your own hands.

MsgJp:
あちこちで言われて聞き飽きただろうが
俺からも言わせてくれ
MsgEn:
You must have heard it said everywhere by now.
But let me say it too.

MsgJp:
逞しくなったな――貫禄すら漂うよ
さあ、報告があるんだろう？
早くすませて土産話を聞かせてくれ
MsgEn:
You've grown strong—even dignified. Now, you have
a report to give, don't you? Get it over with and
tell me about your souvenirs.

MsgJp: 呑ませてくれ――
MsgEn: Let me drink—

MsgJp:
今は呑んで――呑んで――
明日からちゃんとするからさ
MsgEn:
Right now, I'm drinking - drinking - I'll
properly do it starting from tomorrow.

MsgJp: ブ、ブラッドオーブ――探さなくちゃ――
MsgEn: B-Blood Orb... I have to find it...

MsgJp:
俺はここで白竜様と倒れた覚者のために
やれることをやるよ
MsgEn:
I will do what I can here for the Arisen who fell
with the White Dragon.

MsgJp: あんたたち、黒騎士を頼むぞ
MsgEn: I entrust you with the Black Knight.

MsgJp:
一時はどうなることかと思ったよ
もしあのまま――
MsgEn:
For a moment, I thought I was done for. If things
had stayed that way -

MsgJp:
――やーめた！　楽しいことだけ
考えるわ
MsgEn: - Never mind! Just think about the fun parts.

MsgJp:
ふう――覚者でいることは大変だけど
お互い、がんばりましょう
MsgEn:
Phew - being an Arisen is tough, but
we both just have to do our best.

MsgJp:
遠くへ行きたいのよ
誰も行ったことがない地へね
MsgEn:
I want to go far away. To a place no one has ever
been before.

MsgJp:
覚者っぽくないって言われるけど――
やっぱり、わかっちゃうよね
MsgEn:
I'm told that I don't seem like an Arisen, but...
I still understand, you know.

MsgJp:
覚者だからって戦いばかりの人は
正直、どうかと思うな
MsgEn:
A person who only seeks constant battles just
because they are an Arisen, honestly, I think
that's questionable.

MsgJp:
レスタニア中のきれいな風景を見たいけど
そういう場所は魔物が集まりがちだよね
MsgEn:
I want to see the beautiful scenery throughout
Lestania, but those kinds of places tend to
attract enemies.

MsgJp:
魔物を倒したら
白竜様が毎回ほめてくれる――
そんなのだったら、やりがいあると思わない？
MsgEn:
If you defeat the enemy,
the White Dragon will praise you every time--
If that's the case, don't you think it's
rewarding?

MsgJp:
ごきげんよう
さあ、今日はどこへ行こうかな
MsgEn: Hello. Well, where shall we go today?

MsgJp:
覚者って――孤独よね
普通の人だった頃が懐かしい
――なんてね
MsgEn:
Being Arisen -- it's lonely, isn't it? I miss the
time when I was just a normal person. -- Just
kidding!

MsgJp:
覚者の気持ちは覚者にしかわからない
そう思っていたけど――
覚者同士でもわからないこと多いよね
MsgEn:
The feelings of an Arisen can only be understood
by another Arisen, or so I thought... But even
among Arisen, there are many things we don't
understand.

MsgJp:
本当なら覚者は世界にひとりしか存在しない
そんな話を聞いたことがあるの
だったら――これからどうなるんだろうな
MsgEn:
In reality, there should only be one Arisen in
the world Have you ever heard such a story? If
so... what will happen from now on?

MsgJp:
隊長、見てこの腕と足の筋肉！
シュッとして、かっこいいと思わない？
MsgEn:
Captain, look at these arm and leg muscles! Don't
you think they look so cool and shapely?

MsgJp:
最近、やたらと声をかけられるんだけど――
わたしも結構名の売れた覚者になったってこと！？
MsgEn:
Lately, I've been getting a lot of attention and
being approached a lot. Does that mean I've become
quite a renowned Arisen?!

MsgJp:
例えば、ヴァネッサなんて
覚者としても女性としてもひとつの理想型でしょ？
MsgEn:
For example, someone like Vanessa, isn't she an
ideal type both as an Arisen and as a woman?

MsgJp: だからわたしは、あえてそこは目指さないの
MsgEn: So, I intentionally won't aim for that.

MsgJp: 覚者になったことを嘆く気持ちが前はあったけど――
MsgEn:
I used to feel regret about becoming an Arisen,
but...

MsgJp:
今は天職って感じ
ま、仕事じゃないけどね
MsgEn:
It feels like my calling from heaven now. Well,
it's not really a job though.

MsgJp: あら、ごきげんよう
MsgEn: Oh, good day.

MsgJp:
こうして一気に神殿の中枢に食い込めるなんて
ジョゼフ様々！
MsgEn:
I can't believe that we can be in the heart of
the temple all at once like this. Thank you
Joseph!

MsgJp: 精一杯頑張るから、隊長、ひいきしてよね？
MsgEn:
I'll do my best, captain, and you'll patronize
me, right?

MsgJp:
みんなセシリーセシリーって
どうかしちゃったみたい
MsgEn: Everyone seems to be obsessed with Cecily, Cecily.

MsgJp:
まあ、気持ちはわかるけどね
わたしだって、なんとかしてあげたいもの
MsgEn:
Well, I can understand their feelings. I also
want to do something to help.

MsgJp:
時には強く言わないとね
もうお客さんじゃなくて、仲間なんだから
ダメなものはダメ
MsgEn:
Sometimes you have to say it strongly. You're not
a customer anymore, you're a friend. What doesn't
work doesn't work.

MsgJp: あ、セシリーの話ね
MsgEn: Ah, it's about Cecily.

MsgJp:
エリオットの奴、張り切っちゃって
わたしだって負けないから
侵食魔討伐数勝負はわたしのもの！
MsgEn:
Elliot is all fired up, but I won't lose either.
The number of victories in defeating the corrupt
is mine!

MsgJp:
なんだかみんな落ち着いちゃってさ
いいのかな
MsgEn:
It seems like everyone has calmed down. Is it
okay?

MsgJp:
黒騎士は難敵だよね――
闇雲に戦っても勝てないだろうなぁ
MsgEn:
The Black Knight is a formidable opponent, huh? I
don't think you can win by fighting blindly.

MsgJp:
ロイグは、わたしたちが看病したり
治療のために奔走するのが不思議で
たまらないみたい
MsgEn:
Loeg seems to find it fascinating and
irresistible that we take care of him and go all
out for his treatment.

MsgJp: 人の善意に馴れていないんだね
MsgEn: He's not accustomed to people's goodwill.

MsgJp:
もうさ、わたしは戦うの専門でいいかも
腕を磨いて、口出ししないで
ひたすら戦うよ
MsgEn:
Maybe I'll just specialize in fighting
and keep my skills sharp and stay out of the way
I'll just fight.

MsgJp:
黒騎士が来た時、ロイグは勇敢だったよね
見直しちゃったな
MsgEn:
Loeg was brave when the Black Knight came. It
made me reassess him.

MsgJp:
レオを信じる――
うん、わたしはあの人を信じる！
――って、自分に言い聞かせているところ
MsgEn:
I believe in Leo-- Yeah, I believe in that guy!
--I'm just saying to myself.

MsgJp: 隊長、なんだかさ、もう、やるしかないよね！
MsgEn:
Captain, I don't know, I'm just going to have to
do it!

MsgJp:
レオはやっぱりわたしたちのことを考えていて
くれたんだよね
MsgEn: Leo is still thinking about us. He protected us.

MsgJp:
ううん、やっぱり違う
レオが守ったのは
レスタニア全体の未来だよね？
MsgEn:
No, it's different after all. Leo protected the
future of Lestania, right?

MsgJp:
隊長、ほら、遠征？　調査？　散歩？
なんでもいいから、行こうよ
MsgEn:
Captain, hey, expedition? Survey? Walk? Anything
is fine, let's go.

MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアはどうだった？
問題がないなら、こっちでの任務に専念しない？
MsgEn:
Captain, how was Lestania? If everything is okay,
why don't we just focus on the mission over here?

MsgJp:
このフィンダムって、単純――
ううん、原始的っていうか
洗練されてないっていうか――
MsgEn:
This Phindym, it's simple--
No, it's more like primitive, Not refined--

MsgJp:
ちがうな――ああ、素朴！
この素朴さ、わたしは嫌いじゃないな
MsgEn:
No, it's not - ah, rustic!
I don't mind the simplicity.

MsgJp:
わたしたち、後手後手というか――
遅れちゃってるよね
MsgEn: We're kind of behind the curve...

MsgJp:
ねえ、隊長
急いで、事態の先頭に立とうよ
MsgEn:
Hey captain, hurry up and take the lead in the
situation!

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》を持ち去った犯人は
フィンダムがどうなっても構わない――
やっぱり、幾ら考えても気持がわからないな
MsgEn:
The culprit who took away《Primeval Drops》doesn't
care what happens to Phindym after all— I still
can't understand their feelings no matter how much
I think.

MsgJp: ロイグのしたことは許せないけど――
MsgEn: Loeg's actions are unforgivable, but—

MsgJp:
わたしは憎めないな
フィンダムの人たちはどう裁くつもりなんだろう
MsgEn:
I don't hate. I just wonder how the people of
Phindym are going to judge me.

MsgJp:
なんかさ――
セシリーが、すごく遠い人になっちゃった気がする
MsgEn:
I feel like— Cecily has become a very distant
person.

MsgJp:
でもまあ、仕方ないか
ここはあの子の世界だからね
MsgEn:
But well, I guess there's no helping it. Because
this is her world, you know.

MsgJp:
連戦連戦だからね――
さすがに疲れちゃったかな
MsgEn:
Because it's battle after battle-- I guess I'm
really tired now.

MsgJp:
侵食魔退治でも行く？
あー、こんな気持で戦っちゃ
絶対怪我するよね
MsgEn:
Do you want to go fight the corrupted monsters?
Oh, you shouldn't fight like this, you'll get
injured.

MsgJp:
セシリー、普段と変わらないね
どんな気持ちなのかな――
MsgEn:
Cecily, you're still the same as usual. I wonder
how you feel--

MsgJp:
洞が時々、ふわっと輝くの
まるで何かが始まる予兆みたい
MsgEn:
Sometimes the cave's shining softly, as if it's a
prelude to something starting.

MsgJp:
さあ隊長
どこへでも一緒に行くからね
MsgEn: Alright Captain, I'll go with you wherever you go.

MsgJp:
絶望的な状況に呑み込まれてしまう人と
前を向いて進む人の違いって
なんだろうね？
MsgEn:
What's the difference between someone who gets
swallowed up in a hopeless situation and someone
who moves forward?

MsgJp:
解放軍が明るくなったね
メイロワ将軍効果だね
MsgEn:
The Liberation Army has brightened up. It's the
General Meirova effect.

MsgJp:
王子は身も心も盗賊に染まってしまった――
なんてことはないよね？
MsgEn:
The prince became a bandit in body and soul...
It's not true, right?

MsgJp:
王子は無事なのかな
居場所よりも安否の確認が先だよね
MsgEn:
I wonder if the prince is safe. I'd rather know
if he's safe than where he is.

MsgJp:
王子の目的は恩人の盗賊ベルタを救うこと
その気持ちは大切にしないとね
MsgEn:
The prince's goal is to save his benefactor, the
bandit Bertha. We must cherish that sentiment.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、守ってあげたくなっちゃう
小さな弟がいるのってこんな気分？
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo, I feel like I want to protect you.
Is this what it's like to have a little brother?

MsgJp:
ネド王子は前線に立って兵たちを
鼓舞するのが自分の責務だと
考えているみたい
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo seems to think that it is his duty to
encourage the soldiers on the front line.

MsgJp:
空気が汚れた感じがするよね
オークの攻撃臭が漂ってくるからかな
MsgEn:
The air feels polluted, doesn't it? Maybe it's
because the stench of Orc attacks is lingering in
the air.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、顔がいきいきしてるよ
無理してなければいいけど
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo, your face looks so chipper;
I hope you're not forcing yourself.

MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ
MsgEn: Waiting is tough.

MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ
MsgEn: Waiting is tough.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンやエリオットと一緒だと
なんだか焦っちゃうんだよね
MsgEn:
When I'm with Gurdolin and Elliot, I somehow get
anxious.

MsgJp:
あの人たち戦闘中はガツガツするから
調子を乱されちゃうんだ
MsgEn:
Those people are too aggressive during combat, so
it throws off my rhythm.

MsgJp:
ネド王子にお礼を言われると
うん、お姉ちゃんもっと頑張るよって
気になるんだよね
MsgEn:
Now that Prince Nedo's thanked me personally, I
feel like I need to redouble my efforts just for
him.

MsgJp: すっかりお姉ちゃん気分
MsgEn: I feel like a big sister now.

MsgJp:
気になることはいろいろあるけれど
先に解放軍の目的を果たさなくちゃね
MsgEn:
There are various things that I am concerned
about, but first, I have to accomplish the
objective of the Liberation Army.

MsgJp:
エリオットとも話したんだ
今は王都の敵に集中しようってね
MsgEn:
I also talked to Elliot. Now let's focus on the
enemies in the Royal Capital.

MsgJp: 隊長――わたし――ううん、なんでもない
MsgEn: Captain - I - no, it's nothing.

MsgJp: だいじょうぶ――だいじょうぶだよ
MsgEn: It's okay... It's okay.

MsgJp: 隊長――わたし、あいつのこと許さないから
MsgEn: Captain - I won't forgive him.

MsgJp:
迷惑かけちゃったよね
この埋め合わせはするから！
MsgEn:
I caused you trouble, didn't I? I will make it up
to you!

MsgJp:
はぁ――もっとわたしたちを
信じてほしいよねえ
MsgEn:
Haa ―― I wish they would believe in us more, you
know

MsgJp:
ネド王子と再会したら
わたし、ちょっとお説教しちゃうかも？
MsgEn:
If I were to meet Prince Nedo again,
I might give him a little sermon.

MsgJp:
王子のことは心配だけど
メイロワ将軍たちに任せておけば
大丈夫だよね
MsgEn:
I'm worried about the prince, but if we leave it
to General Meirova and the others, it should be
fine, right?

MsgJp:
エリオットさあ、大丈夫大丈夫って言い過ぎ！
その方が気になっちゃうじゃない
MsgEn:
Elliot, come on, you say it's okay too much!
You're making me nervous.

MsgJp: ネド王子はいつか竜になるんだよね
MsgEn: Prince Nedo will become a dragon someday.

MsgJp:
どんな感じなのかな
セシリーとは違うのかな
MsgEn:
I wonder what it feels like. How is it different
from Cecily?

MsgJp: なにかお話ししてくださいな
MsgEn: Please tell me something.

MsgJp: うふふ――ご機嫌いかがですか？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: 内緒話は、ジョゼフおじさまに叱られます
MsgEn:
Uncle Joseph will scold us for talking in
private.

MsgJp:
覚者様は考えたことがありますか？
この世界がどうやって出来たのか――
MsgEn:
Have the Arisen ever thought about it? How was
this world made?

MsgJp:
白竜だけがこの世界の
すべてを知っている――
早くお話しを聞きたいですね
MsgEn:
Only the White Dragon knows everything in this
world--
I want to hear the story quickly.

MsgJp: 覚者になるって、どんな気分ですか？
MsgEn: What does it feel like to become an Arisen?

MsgJp:
戦争って、どんな時代にもありますね
嫌いな人の方が多いはずなのに
MsgEn:
War exists in any era, huh? Even though there
should be more people who hate it.

MsgJp:
みんなでお歌をうたえば戦いがなくなる――
パメラがそう言うんだけど
きっと、そんなに簡単ではないですよね
MsgEn:
If we all sing a song together, there will be no
more fighting--
Pamela says so.
I bet it's not that easy!

MsgJp:
時々、わけもなく悲しくなるの
ううん――わけはあるけど――
話しても誰も戻ってこないから
MsgEn:
Sometimes I feel sad for no reason.
No, I mean, I have my reasons, but...
I talk about it, and no one ever comes back.

MsgJp:
白竜も、人間も、覚者も――魔物だって
同じように生きているんだよね
MsgEn:
Both the White Dragon and humans, as well as the
Arisen, and even enemies, all live in the same
way.

MsgJp:
お友達はいつかいなくなるもの――
それでも、ほしいと思ってしまうの
MsgEn:
Friends are things that eventually disappear ――
But still, you can't help but want them.

MsgJp: この風――あの森にも、吹いているのかな
MsgEn:
I wonder, this wind—Is it blowing in that forest,
too?

MsgJp:
真っ直ぐに進む人は
大切なことを忘れがちです
覚者さん、気をつけてね
MsgEn:
Those who proceed straight ahead tend to forget
important things. Arisen one, be cautious.

MsgJp: 時は――少し、意地悪です
MsgEn: Time is-- harsh.

MsgJp: あれ？　何して遊ぶ？　え？　お話し？
MsgEn: Oh? What should we play? Draw? A story?

MsgJp: こんにちは、メイリーフです
MsgEn: Hello, I'm Mayleaf

MsgJp:
あ、覚えていてくれましたか？
だとしたら、うれしいです！
MsgEn:
Oh, you remember me?
If so, I'm glad!

MsgJp:
あのね――迷惑かけちゃったけど
仲良くしてね？
MsgEn:
Hey, I'm sorry for causing you trouble, but let's
get along, okay?

MsgJp:
わたしはイリスとも仲良しなんだ
だから、イリスが戻ってわたしもうれしいの
MsgEn:
I'm good friends with Iris, so I'm glad she's
back.

MsgJp:
レオが恐い顔をしていたの――
ちょっとびっくりしちゃった
MsgEn:
Leo had a scary look on his face— I was a little
surprised.

MsgJp: 白竜様、元気になーれ！
MsgEn: Who, don't bully—Peco— I won't do bad things.

MsgJp:
わたしはもう絶対にひとりでは神殿から
出ないからね
MsgEn: I will never leave the Temple alone again!

MsgJp:
あなたにもパメラにもジョゼフ様にも
心配をかけちゃって――
MsgEn:
To both you and Pamela and Master Joseph, I
apologize for causing you worry...

MsgJp:
だからこれからは、必ず、誰かと一緒に――
もちろん、みんなが知ってる誰かと一緒に
お出かけすることにして――
MsgEn:
So from now on, I'll be sure to go out with
someone—of course, someone we all know—and—

MsgJp:
しかも、知らない場所へは行かないって
約束するよ！
MsgEn:
And I promise that I won't go to places I don't
know!

MsgJp:
キースヒルト――無事だよね？
ちゃんと逃げるよね？
MsgEn:
Kieshildt--you're safe, right?
You're going to escape, aren't you?

MsgJp: キースヒルト兄様をお願いします
MsgEn: Please take care of Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
――つらいよ
こんなにつらいなんて――
MsgEn:
――This is painful.
How can it be this painful――

MsgJp:
わたしのせいなのかな――
わたしが悪かったのかな――
MsgEn:
Is it my fault--
Was I wrong--?

MsgJp:
わたしはこれからキースヒルトのぶんまで
生きるから――
MsgEn: I'm going to live on, for Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
ううん、死んでしまった人、全員のぶん
わたしは生きるの――そう決めたの
MsgEn:
No, for all those who have died. I'm going to
live - I've decided.

MsgJp:
どこにも行かないで？
誰にもいなくなってほしくないの
MsgEn:
Don't go anywhere. I don't want anyone to
disappear.

MsgJp:
ミシアルとこのあたりを歩いたって本当？
どうしてうちに寄ってくれなかったの！？
MsgEn:
Mysial, is it true that you walked around this
area? Why didn't you come visit me?

MsgJp:
何か怖いことが起こりそうな――
そんな気がするよ？
MsgEn: I feel like something scary is about to happen—

MsgJp:
空気がビリビリ震えているの――
これは良くないことのシルシなの――
MsgEn:
The air is tingling - This is the sign of
something bad -

MsgJp: ねえねえ、イリスはどこにいるの？
MsgEn: Hey, where is Iris?

MsgJp:
わたしを遠くに連れ出したことで
みんな怒っているから教えてくれないの？
MsgEn:
Why won't you tell me? Is it because everyone is
angry with you for taking me far away?

MsgJp:
どうしよう――ミシアルが――
でも、お願い――イリスを怒らないで！
MsgEn:
What should I do―― Mysial――
But, please―― Do not make Iris angry!

MsgJp:
ミシアルみたいに白竜と仲良くなるよ
応援して――ね？
MsgEn:
I'll become friends with the White Dragon like
Mysial.
I hope you support me――okay?

MsgJp:
わたしじゃダメかもしれないけど
それでも応援してね
MsgEn:
I might not be good enough,
but please support me anyway.

MsgJp:
みんな行っちゃうの？
ちゃんと帰ってきてね？
MsgEn:
Are you all leaving?
You'll come back, won't you?

MsgJp: もう、誰もいなくなったら、いやだよ？
MsgEn: I don't want everyone to disappear already.

MsgJp:
力を貸してください――って
白竜様にお祈りしてるの
MsgEn: I'm praying to the White Dragon to help me--

MsgJp: でも、全然起きてくれないの
MsgEn: But they still won't wake up at all.

MsgJp:
がんばれ！
がんばれっ！
MsgEn: Do your best! Do your best!

MsgJp:
おかえりなさい！
ええと、わたしね――ええと――
MsgEn: Welcome back! Um, as for me... um...

MsgJp:
あ、ごめんなさい
わたしじゃなくて、まず、白竜様だよね？
MsgEn:
Oh, I'm sorry. It's not me, but The White Dragon
first, right?

MsgJp: 白竜様も、早く元気になるといいね
MsgEn: I hope The White Dragon gets well soon.

MsgJp:
黒騎士はどこへ行ったの？
行方がわからないなんてこわい！
MsgEn:
Where did The Black Knight go? It's scary not
knowing their whereabouts!

MsgJp: リズ、もう聞こえていないみたい――
MsgEn: Lise, I don't think he can hear me anymore—

MsgJp: 隊長さん、気をつけてね
MsgEn: Captain, be careful.

MsgJp: 全部終わったんだよね？
MsgEn: Is it all finished?

MsgJp:
こわいことや悲しいことは
もう起こらないんだよね？
MsgEn: Scary and sad things won't happen anymore, right?

MsgJp:
いまは戦いに備える時
語り合うのは、またの機会だ
MsgEn:
Now is the time to prepare for battle.
We'll talk about it another time.

MsgJp: 覚者――白竜の力を預かる者か
MsgEn:
Arisen - the one who holds the power of The White
Dragon.

MsgJp:
――？　ああ、失礼
考え事を少々、ね
MsgEn:
――? Ah, excuse me.
Just thinking about something for a moment, hmm.

MsgJp:
そういうえば覚者と話したことは
あまりなかったな――
今度ゆっくり話そうか
MsgEn:
Come to think of it, I didn't have many
conversations with the Arisen—
Shall we talk in detail next time?

MsgJp:
聞きたいことが山ほどある
そんな顔だね
MsgEn:
There are so many things I want to ask. That's
the kind of expression you have.

MsgJp:
僕はどんなふうに見えるんだい？
生を楽しんでいるように見えるかい？
MsgEn:
How do I look?
Do I look like I'm enjoying life?

MsgJp:
気づかなかったが――
きみはいい目をしているな
MsgEn: I hadn't noticed— you have a good eye.

MsgJp:
覚えていてほしい
取るに足りない――なんでもない――
そういうことが実は大きな意味を持っている
それに気づくのはね、大いなる喜びだよ
MsgEn:
Remember, insignificant—nothing—such things
actually mean a great deal. It's a great joy to
realize that, you know?

MsgJp:
つくづく思うよ
世界はね、複雑なんだ
白と黒、善と悪――
そんな単純な区分けはできないのさ
MsgEn:
I really think the world is, you know,
complicated black and white, good and evil--
there's no such simple division.

MsgJp:
人間は興味深いけど
時に、難解すぎる存在だよ
MsgEn:
Humans are interesting but sometimes, they are
too difficult to understand.

MsgJp:
信じる力はとても大切だ
僕も信じているんだ
帰るべき場所――仲間の無事をね
MsgEn:
The power of belief is very important. I believe
in it too. The place I should return to - the
safety of my comrades.

MsgJp:
朝が好きなんだ
幼いころに感じた、あの風の匂いがするからね
MsgEn:
I like mornings, because it reminds me of the
scent of that wind when I was a child.

MsgJp: ああ、君か
MsgEn: Ah, it's you.

MsgJp: 死に急ぐか、若造が
MsgEn: Do you want to hurry up and die, you brat?

MsgJp: 慈悲などやらん、死ね
MsgEn: No mercy, just death.

MsgJp: 木偶どもにはもう飽きたわ
MsgEn: I'm tired of these puppets already.

MsgJp:
わからんな――
お前に勝ち目などない
MsgEn: I don't understand— you don't stand a chance.

MsgJp:
殺し合いの最中に――
笑わせてくれるわ
MsgEn: In the midst of the killing, You make me laugh.

MsgJp:
帰れ――殺すぞ？
おまえは好かん
MsgEn: Go home... or I'll kill you. I don't like you.

MsgJp: まだ盾突くか――ならば、死をくれてやる
MsgEn:
If you still dare to thrust your shield――then
allow me to give you death

MsgJp:
殺す、ただ殺す
それが世界だ
MsgEn: Kill, just kill. That's how the world works.

MsgJp:
気づいているだろうが――
おまえらの死は無駄にはならん
ふははは！
MsgEn:
You may have noticed, but...
Your deaths will not be in vain.
Hahaha!

MsgJp:
その命、よこせ
さあ、よこせ！
MsgEn: Give me that life. Come on, give it to me!

MsgJp: ほう――身の程知らずめ
MsgEn: You fool, know your place.

MsgJp: なんだ？　うまい話でもあるのか？
MsgEn: What's that? You got a better offer?

MsgJp:
オマイと話だと？
ガハハハ、笑わせる！
MsgEn: Talking to me? Gahahahaha, you make me laugh!

MsgJp: 遊びたいが、またな
MsgEn: I'd love to play, but see ya.

MsgJp:
俺サマとトモダチになろうってか？
悪くないな、でも、まあヤメとくよ
MsgEn:
You want to become friends with me? Not bad, but
well, I'll pass.

MsgJp:
オマイ、強いんだろ？
ちょいと、試してやろうか？
MsgEn: You, are you strong? Shall I test you a little?

MsgJp: オマイら、まとめてブッ壊すからな
MsgEn: I'll destroy all of you at once!

MsgJp:
あ？　目的だと？
楽しみは秘密にする主義でな
MsgEn:
What?　You said you wanted to do this?
I like to keep my pleasures a secret.

MsgJp:
暴れたいトキに暴れる
それが人生ってヤツだ
MsgEn:
When you want to go wild, just go wild.
That's what life is all about.

MsgJp:
つまんねえな
ここいらにゃ、弱いヤツらしかいねえのか
MsgEn:
Boring.
Are there only weak people around here?

MsgJp:
アレを、アレして――こうなる！
グフ、グフフフフフ！
MsgEn:
Doing that, it becomes like this! Gufu,
gufufufufu!

MsgJp: なんだよ――オマイ、なんだよ！
MsgEn: What is it - you, what is it!

MsgJp:
巡る竜力を感じます――
やっぱり、心地良いものですね
MsgEn:
I feel the Dragon Force circulating around— After
all, it's a pleasant sensation.

MsgJp: 黒騎士のことを考えていました――
MsgEn: I was thinking about The Black Knight...

MsgJp:
こう見えて、結構戦えるつもりです
必要とあればなんなりと
MsgEn:
Despite my appearance, I am prepared to fight
rather well. If necessary, I am willing to do
whatever it takes.

MsgJp:
みなさんの戦い方はとても洗練されていますね
勉強させてもらいます
MsgEn:
Everyone's way of fighting is very refined, isn't
it? I will learn from it.

MsgJp: みなさんとご一緒できて光栄です
MsgEn: It's an honor to be here with you all.

MsgJp: ご恩はいつかお返しさせていただきます
MsgEn: Yes, I will return the favor someday.

MsgJp:
覚者が一目置かれるのは
みなさんの普段の行いが素晴らしいからですよね
MsgEn:
Arisen are respected because of everyone's
wonderful daily conduct, aren't they?

MsgJp: お疲れじゃないですか？
MsgEn: Are you tired?

MsgJp:
面倒をかけているわたしが言うのも変ですけど――
時々休んでくださいね
MsgEn:
It's strange for someone like me who is causing
trouble to say it, but please take occasional
rests.

MsgJp: はい、なんでしょう
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
本当に何から何までお世話になってしまって
お礼の言葉もありません
MsgEn:
I really can't thank you enough for everything
you've done for me.

MsgJp:
わたしにできることがあれば言ってください
戦場でも少しはお役に立てると思います
MsgEn:
Let me know if there is anything I can do for you.
I'm sure I can be of some help on the battlefield.

MsgJp:
わかっています
少し――いいえ、かなり焦っています
MsgEn:
I understand I'm a little bit - no, I'm quite
anxious.

MsgJp:
これ以上、ご迷惑をおかけするのが
心苦しくって――
MsgEn: It pains me to cause you any more trouble.

MsgJp:
ロイグ――
あの人はわたしを知っていましたけど
わたしは――
いくら記憶を探ってもロイグが登場しません
MsgEn:
Loeg ――
That person knew me.
But I ――
No matter how much I search my memory, Loeg does
not appear.

MsgJp:
それほど交わりの薄い人なのでしょうか――
もう一度会えれば――話せれば――
MsgEn:
Is he such a distant person to me - If I could
see him again - If I could talk to him -

MsgJp:
不思議です
不安だし、焦りもあるんですけど
MsgEn: It's strange and I feel uneasy and anxious, but.

MsgJp:
以前とは違って――
みなさんと一緒なら、なんとかなる
そんな風に思えるようになりました
MsgEn:
Unlike before - I feel like I can manage with
everyone.

MsgJp:
ロイグと話せればわたしの記憶は
きっと戻ると思います
MsgEn:
If I can talk to Loeg, I'm sure my memories will
come back.

MsgJp:
待っていてくださいね
きっと――
きっと全部思い出しますから
MsgEn:
Please wait for me. I'm sure—I'll definitely
remember everything.

MsgJp:
もっともっとロイグと話すべきですよね？
それはわかっているんです
でも、もどかしくて――
MsgEn:
I should talk to Loeg more often, right? I know
that but it's frustrating.

MsgJp:
わたしたちは勝利に向かって
確実に進んでいるはずですよね
MsgEn: We are definitely on the road to victory.

MsgJp:
もちろん勝利が全てではありませんけど
未来への道しるべになりますよね？
MsgEn:
Of course, winning isn't everything. But it's a
signpost for the future, right?

MsgJp:
ゲートのことはわたしに任せてください
どんなに時間がかかっても
皆さんを必ずフィンダムにご招待します
MsgEn:
Let me take care of the gate. No matter how long
it takes, I promise to bring you all to Phindym!

MsgJp:
早く集落を目指しましょう
何より、森の中は安全とは言えません
MsgEn:
Let's get to the village as soon as possible.
Above all, it is not safe in the forest!

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
ガルドリンさんがいい人なのは知っていますが
誤解を招きやすい性格ですから――
胸騒ぎがします！
MsgEn:
Captain, let's hurry. I know Gurdolin is a good
person, but they have a personality that is easily
misunderstood. I have a feeling of unease!

MsgJp:
状況に流されるだけではなく、抵抗を試みる――
フィンダムではまだ新しい考え方です
MsgEn:
Don't just be swept away by the situation, try to
resist-- It's still a new idea in Phindym!

MsgJp:
協力してくれる人はまだまだ少ないので
わたしが父を探してあげないと――
MsgEn:
Since there are still very few people who are
willing to help, I have to find my father
myself...

MsgJp:
隊長――
父に――父にもしものことがあれば
わたしは――
MsgEn:
Captain -- If something were to happen to my
father -- I...

MsgJp:
すいません、今はこんな個人的な思いは
しまっておくべきですよね
MsgEn:
Sorry, I should probably put these personal
thoughts away for now.

MsgJp:
隊長、父は元気になりますよね？
父の傷は、致命傷ではありませんよね？
MsgEn:
Captain, is Father going to be okay? His wounds
are not fatal, right?

MsgJp:
あと少しですよ、隊長
《原始の雫》が芯なる樹を――
ひいてはこのフィンダムを浄化してくれます
MsgEn:
Left: just a little more, Captain. The "Primeval
Drops" will cleanse the core tree- and in turn,
cleanse Phindym for us.

MsgJp:
その後の美しいフィンダムを
皆さん、ご案内しますからね
MsgEn:
I will show everyone the beautiful Phindym that
comes after that.

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》はわたしの命に替えても守ります
隊長たちは魔物退治に専念してください
MsgEn:
I will protect the《Primeval Drops》 with my life.
Captain, please focus on defeating the enemies.

MsgJp:
このあたりの侵食魔を一掃すれば
次はいよいよ浄化です
もう少し、よろしくお願いします
MsgEn:
If we completely eliminate these corrupting
demons in this area, then it will finally be time
for the purification. A little while longer,
please.

MsgJp:
明るい未来――
夢見ても大丈夫ですよね？
MsgEn: Bright future-- It's okay to dream, right?

MsgJp: 隊長――あと少しだけ、よろしくお願いしますね
MsgEn:
Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more
minutes.

MsgJp:
おつかれさまです、隊長
俺のやる気、爆発しそうですよ！
MsgEn:
Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more
minutes.

MsgJp:
隊長、俺を忙しくしてください
ジョゼフ様のところへは戻りたくないんです
MsgEn:
Captain, please keep me busy I don't want to go
back to Master Joseph.

MsgJp:
レスタニアはまた大変なことになりましたけど――
そのおかげで隊長と一緒に働けて――
MsgEn:
Lestania is in trouble again, but— that allowed
me to work with the captain and—

MsgJp: 不謹慎だけど――俺、うれしいです
MsgEn: I know it's inappropriate—but I'm glad I'm here.

MsgJp:
隊長がレオ統率の右腕なら――
俺は隊長の右腕になります！
MsgEn:
If Captain is Leo's right-hand man, I will be
Captain's right-hand man!

MsgJp:
リズと俺――ある意味、敵同士ですよね
どっちが隊長の信頼を勝ち取るか――みたいな
MsgEn:
Lise and me—In a way, we are enemies, aren't we?
It's like, who will earn the captain's trust?

MsgJp:
セシリーはちょっと固いというか――
真面目すぎるんですよね
MsgEn: Cecily is a bit stiff or-- too serious.

MsgJp:
オーク戦争の頃、リズはレスタニアを巡って
お宝とか探してたらしいですね
なんだか、遅れを取った気分です
MsgEn:
I heard that during the orc wars, Lise was
cruising around Lestania looking for treasures and
stuff.
I feel like I'm falling behind!

MsgJp:
侵食魔のせいかな――
少し空気が濁った感じ、しませんか？
MsgEn:
Maybe it's the Corruption?
The air seems a little muddy, don't you think?

MsgJp:
隊長――
やっぱり覚者というのは戦ってこそ、ですよね
つくづく、そう思いますよ
MsgEn:
Captain-- Indeed, it is through battle that an
Arisen truly shows their worth. I am deeply
convinced of this.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンが細々と賭けを持ちかけてくるんですよね
おかげで――いえ、なんでもありません！
MsgEn:
Gurdolin keeps coming up with small bets, you
know. Thanks to that... Well, never mind!

MsgJp:
戦いに慣れてから、時々ですけど、もっと刺激が
ほしいなんて、考えちゃうんですよ
MsgEn:
After getting used to battles, sometimes, I can't
help but think that I want more excitement.

MsgJp: ダメですよね、こういうこと考えちゃ
MsgEn: It's not good, thinking about things like that.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンのこと、いろんな人から聞くんですけど
どうやら最近は丸くなったというか
落ち着いたというか――
MsgEn:
I hear about Gurdolin from various people, and it
seems that recently, they have become more
well-rounded, or rather, calmer.

MsgJp:
最近のことしか知らない俺にしてみれば
これで！？　って感じですけどね
MsgEn:
From my perspective, as someone who only knows
recent things, I have to say... is this it!? But
well, that's how I feel.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様から聞く話に隊長が登場するようになって
どれくらい経つか忘れましたけど――
MsgEn:
It has been some time since Captain made their
debut, or so it feels, as I heard from Sir Joseph.
But I can't exactly remember how long ago it was.

MsgJp: 思うに、隊長って、全然変わってないですよね
MsgEn:
In my opinion, the captain hasn't changed at all,
right?

MsgJp:
リズって、ああ見えて、意外と世の中を
見てるんですよね
自分のことは見えていないようだけど
MsgEn:
Lise looks like that, but she sees the world
surprisingly well.
She doesn't seem to see herself, though.

MsgJp: なんでしょうか、隊長！
MsgEn: What is it, Captain!

MsgJp:
セシリーはいい子ですよねえ
力になってあげたいなあ
MsgEn:
Cecily is a good girl, isn't she? I want to be
supportive.

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
何もかも、急ぎましょう
MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry! with everything, I mean

MsgJp:
早くセシリーを楽にしてあげないと
こっちまで息が詰まりそうです
MsgEn:
We need to make Cecily feel better soon. I'm
choking up too!

MsgJp:
まあ、楽にすると言っても
どうしたらいいかなんて
わからないんですけどね
MsgEn:
Well, even if I say I want to make it easier, I
don't know what to do, you know?

MsgJp:
騎士団には売れるだけ恩を売っておけなんていう
覚者もいますけど、俺に言わせれば
持ちつ持たれつですよ
MsgEn:
Some Arisen believe in gaining favor with the
knight order as much as possible, but in my
opinion, it's all about mutual support.

MsgJp:
売ったとか買ったとか、借りた貸したなんて
どうでもいいことです――
って、考えられる人になりたいんです、俺
MsgEn:
Selling, buying, borrowing, lending... It's all
trivial stuff. I want to become someone who can
think about more important things—me.

MsgJp:
時々、セシリーが思い詰めた顔をしていますよ？
なんとかしてあげられませんかねえ
もう、見ていられませんよ
MsgEn:
Sometimes, Cecily has a troubled look on her
face, you know? Can't we do something to help her?
I can't bear to watch anymore.

MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアは広いですね
今回ばかりは痛感しています
MsgEn:
Captain, Lestania is far, isn't it? I am feeling
this particularly keenly this time.

MsgJp:
走っても、戦っても、尽きない敵
ええ、やりがいがありますよ！
MsgEn:
Running, fighting, and endless enemies. Yes, it's
challenging!

MsgJp: 俺、連戦でちょっと疲れちゃって――
MsgEn: I'm a little tired from the consecutive battles...

MsgJp:
もちろん、何かあれば動きますから
それ以外はここでジッとさせてください
MsgEn:
Of course, if you need me to move, I'll move.
Otherwise, please let me stay put here.

MsgJp:
俺は隊長の右腕を自認してますから
誰が戻ろうと、去ろうと、そこだけは
変わりませんからね
もちろん、ものすごく期待はしていますけど――
MsgEn: Of course, I have really high expectations, but -

MsgJp:
セシリーの記憶が戻っても問題が
解決するわけじゃないんですよね
鍛錬して、腕を磨いておこうかな
MsgEn:
Even if Cecily's memory returns, it doesn't mean
the problem will be solved, right? Maybe I should
train and sharpen my skills.

MsgJp: 黒騎士対策が急務ってところですかね
MsgEn:
Is countermeasures against the Black Knight the
urgent matter here?

MsgJp:
記憶が戻るとか、どうでも良くなりましたね
せめて意識が戻ってくれれば――
MsgEn:
Back to memory, or whatever, it doesn't matter
anymore. At least if consciousness can return—

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょうよ
急いては事をし損じるなんて
言ってる場合じゃありません！
MsgEn:
Captain, let's hurry up. There's no time to waste
by rushing. We can't afford to be talking about
it!

MsgJp:
白竜様以外の竜の覚者と一緒に戦うなんて
こんな機会はもうないかもしれませんよね？
MsgEn:
Isn't it unlikely to ever have the opportunity to
fight alongside any dragon's Arisen other than the
White Dragon?

MsgJp:
隊長と一緒にいられるだけでも幸せなのに
その師匠筋のレオ統率の生き様まで
間近で見られて――俺、胸が熱いです
MsgEn:
I am happy just being able to be with the
captain, And now, witnessing the way of life of
Leo up close... My heart is burning.

MsgJp:
耳を澄ますと、聞き慣れない音がしますね
空気が濃くて、ねっとりとまとわりつくような――
MsgEn:
When you listen carefully, you can hear
unfamiliar sounds. The air is thick and sticky, as
if it is enveloping you.

MsgJp:
気にしすぎですかね――
やっぱり、ビビってるんですかね
MsgEn:
Is it because I'm worrying too much - Am I just
being scared after all?

MsgJp: ガルドリンは俺が見つけてみせますよ
MsgEn: Gurdolin will be found

MsgJp:
あの人は認めないでしょうけど
俺たち、結構、心が通じ合っているような
気がするんですよね
MsgEn:
That person might not admit it, but I feel like
our hearts are somewhat connected, you know?

MsgJp:
ロイグはどこでしょうね
ガルドリンも、はぐれたきりらしいですよ
MsgEn: Where can Loeg be? Gurdolin also seems to be lost.

MsgJp:
セシリーのお父さんは
それなりに強い戦士に育った娘の帰りを
待っていたのではないでしょうか？
MsgEn:
I think Cecily's father was waiting for his
daughter to return after she grew up to be a
strong warrior in her own right.

MsgJp:
本当は娘と一緒に行きたかったけど
いつまでも待っているわけにはいかず――
MsgEn:
I really wanted to go with my daughter, but I
couldn't wait forever to--

MsgJp:
とすれば、セシリーを早く帰してやれなかった
俺たちの責任も、あるのかもしれません
MsgEn:
If that's the case, maybe it's our fault for not
getting Cecily home sooner.

MsgJp:
族長が回復したらすぐに出発できるように
身体を温めておきましょう
電光石火の、雫奪回作戦です！
MsgEn:
Once the clan chief has recovered, we can depart
immediately, so let's keep our bodies warm. It's
time for the lightning-fast operation to reclaim
the drop!

MsgJp:
あははは
なんだかセシリーが大きく見えますよね
ここで居心地悪そうにしてた時とは
別人のようです
MsgEn:
Ahahahaha!
Somehow, Cecily looks bigger, doesn't she?
She seems like a completely different person from
when she was feeling uncomfortable here.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの中心部に向かうんですよね
しかも、世界を救うために――
これって、凄いことだなあ
MsgEn:
We're heading to the heart of Phindym,
And to save the world--
This is awesome!

MsgJp:
さあ、まだ魔物はいますよ！
休んでいるヒマなんてありません
MsgEn:
Well, there are still enemies here!
There is no time to rest.

MsgJp:
胸騒ぎが止まりません――
なんでしょう、これ
MsgEn: I can't stop the excitement— What is this?

MsgJp:
わははは！
隊長、もう感情を抑えられません
早く決めちゃいましょう！
MsgEn:
Wahaha! Captain, I can't contain my emotions
anymore. Let's decide quickly!

MsgJp:
理というのは――
見方によっちゃあ、酷なものですね
MsgEn:
Depending on how you look at it, order can be a
cruel thing, you know.

MsgJp:
俺たちをここに連れてきた竜の思惑なんて
わかりませんけど、アッカーシェランには
俺たちの援助が必要です
MsgEn:
I don't understand the intentions of the dragon
that brought us here, but Acre Selund needs our
assistance.

MsgJp: 俺は、そう確信しています！
MsgEn: I am convinced of that!

MsgJp: この状況、俺たちで変えて見せましょう！
MsgEn:
Let's change this situation, and show what we can
do!

MsgJp: 王子はどこですかねえ
MsgEn: Where is the prince, I wonder?

MsgJp:
聞くところによると西方はなかなか
厄介な地域らしいですよ
MsgEn:
According to reports, the western region is said
to be quite troublesome area.

MsgJp: 王家の威光もあまり届いていないとか
MsgEn:
The royal family's authority does not seem to
reach very far.

MsgJp:
隊長、アッカーシェランの歴史や政治とは
距離を置いた方が得策ですよね
MsgEn:
Captain, it's in your best interest to keep your
distance from Acre Selund's history and politics

MsgJp:
王子救出に夢中になっていましけど
“悪しき竜”はどこにいるんでしょうね
MsgEn:
I'm currently focused on rescuing the prince, but
where could the "Evil Dragon" be?

MsgJp: 邪魔する気もないみたいですし
MsgEn: And they don't seem to want to interfere.

MsgJp:
王子はまだまだ子供で頼りないけど
そのおかげで解放軍は一丸となる――
MsgEn:
The prince is still a child and unreliable, but
thanks to that, the liberation army will unite as
one.

MsgJp:
俺でさえ、守ってやりたいと
思いますからね
MsgEn: Even I, want to protect you.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、王子らしくあろうとして
無理してる気がするんですけど
隊長、どう思います？
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo, I feel like he's trying to be more
like a prince and forcing himself. Captain, what
do you think?

MsgJp:
武器、防具――装備品、全ての手入れは
完璧です！
MsgEn:
Weapons, armor--equipment, all taken care of
perfectly!

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”の言葉を覚えていますか？
MsgEn: Do you remember the words of the "Evil Dragon"?

MsgJp:
絶望の大陸を楽しめって――
俺たち、挑発されてますよ？
乗ってやりましょうか！？
MsgEn:
"Enjoy the Land of Despair" - we are being
provoked. Shall we ride?!

MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
MsgEn: Rest when you can. We often forget this!

MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
MsgEn:
Rest when you can.
We often forget this!

MsgJp: やっぱり覚者は戦ってこそ、ですね
MsgEn: After all, an Arisen should fight.

MsgJp:
これも広い意味で白竜様をお守りする
覚者ならではの戦いですから
MsgEn:
This is also a battle in the broad sense of
protecting the White Dragon, that only the Arisen
can fight.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様じゃありませんが――
事がうまく運ぶほど“悪しき竜”の
動向が気になっちゃいますね
MsgEn:
I'm not Joseph, but--
the more things go well, the more I wonder what
the "evil dragon" is up to.

MsgJp:
解放軍が増員されれば俺たちの負担も
多少は減るでしょうから、黒い騎士のことは
その時に考えましょう
MsgEn:
If the liberation army is increased, our burden
will be reduced, so let's think about the black
knight at that time!

MsgJp:
鎧の中身が誰だろうと目の前に現れたら
俺は戦うだけですよ！
MsgEn: Why, in such a state...

MsgJp:
隊長、どうしましょう
何から手をつけていいのか――
MsgEn:
Captain, what should we do I don't even know
where to start--

MsgJp:
早くなんとかしないと俺たちまで
動けなくなりますね
MsgEn:
If we don't do something soon, even we will
become unable to move.

MsgJp:
やりましょう、隊長
俺、レスタニアもアッカーシェランも
全部引き受けますよ！
MsgEn:
Let's do it, Captain.
I'll take care of Lestania, Acre Selund,
I'll take care of everything!

MsgJp:
黒騎士を倒して白竜様の力と
メガドを取り戻しましょう！
MsgEn:
Let's defeat the Black Knight and restore the
power of the White Dragon and Megado!

MsgJp:
いやー、なんか、鼻歌出ちゃいますよ
ついつい浮かれちゃうんです
MsgEn:
Well, somehow, a song just slips out.
I can't help but get carried away.

MsgJp: ネド王子が我々と離れたがっている――
MsgEn: Prince Nedo wants to leave us—

MsgJp:
これまでの経緯を思うと
それは考えにくいですよね
MsgEn:
Given what we've been through,
that's unlikely.

MsgJp:
この時間に何かできることが
あるかもしれませんね？
MsgEn:
At this time, there may be something we can do,
right?

MsgJp:
体力増強とか地勢確認とか――
考えてみましょうか
MsgEn:
Maybe we should think about increasing our
strength, or checking the terrain--

MsgJp:
俺はいつ、どんな時でも隊長の右腕です
頼りにしてくださいね
MsgEn:
I'm the captain's right hand man whenever and
however you need me.
You can count on me.

MsgJp:
大丈夫ですってば！
みんな心配しすぎですよ
MsgEn:
I'm fine!
Everyone is worrying too much.

MsgJp:
あははは――
少し張り切り過ぎました
MsgEn:
Ahahaha――
I got a little too carried away.

MsgJp:
落ち着いたらキノザのお湯に浸かって
養生するつもりです
MsgEn:
Once I get settled down, I plan to soak in the
Kinoza hot spring for recuperation.

MsgJp:
まだ勝手がわからなくてね
無礼があったら教えてくれ
MsgEn:
I'm still getting the hang of this. Let me know
if I'm being rude.

MsgJp:
わたしがここにいる意味――
それをね、ずっと考えているんだ
MsgEn: I've been thinking about what I'm here for.

MsgJp: 君たちから学ぶべきことは本当に多いよ
MsgEn: I really have a lot to learn from you guys.

MsgJp:
幾つもの出会いが――
わたしをここまで連れてきたのだろうね
MsgEn: How many encounters have brought me here?

MsgJp:
わたしも覚者だったら――
君たちを見ているとそう思わずにはいられない
MsgEn:
If I were also an Arisen―― I can't help but think
that when I look at all of you.

MsgJp:
人生の分岐路なんて、通過してみないと
わからないものだね――最近、そう思うんだ
MsgEn:
You don't know the crossroads of life until you
pass through them; that's what I've been thinking
lately.

MsgJp:
――ああ、失礼
昔のことをね――故郷のことを思い出していた
MsgEn:
Ah, excuse me, I was reminiscing about the old
days, thinking about my hometown.

MsgJp:
人は変わるね――ああ、良くも悪くも
変わるものさ
MsgEn:
People change――Ah, for better or worse
We change

MsgJp: なんだろう
MsgEn: I wonder what it is.

MsgJp:
レオはいい奴だ
付き合いが浅くても、それだけはわかるよ
MsgEn:
Leo is a good guy. Even though we don't know each
other well, that much is clear.

MsgJp:
少し休ませてくれ
いろいろ考えたいんだ
MsgEn: I need some rest. I've got a lot to think about.

MsgJp: セシリーは眠っているようにしか見えないな
MsgEn: Cecily looks like she's asleep.

MsgJp:
セシリーは助かるんだろう？
君たちが動いているんだから不安はない
そう言い聞かせてはいるんだけどね
MsgEn: Wishing you good luck!

MsgJp:
セシリーが元気になって本当に良かった
わたしの提案が彼女を危機に追いやった
わけだからね
MsgEn:
I'm glad Cecily has regained her health. It was
my suggestion that put her in crisis, so that's
why.

MsgJp:
ああこの空気――
やっぱりたまらなくおいしいよ
MsgEn:
Ah, this sky―― After all, it's irresistibly
delicious.

MsgJp:
娘から色々と聞いたが――
わたしも一度はレスタニアを見たいものだ
MsgEn:
My daughter has told me so much about it— I wish
I could see Lestania at least once.

MsgJp:
フィンダムは変わりつつある
暮らす者たちの意識は確実に変わっている
MsgEn:
Phindym is changing.
The attitude of the people living here is
definitely changing.

MsgJp:
芯なる樹が病めば、竜も、大地も
人も、魔物さえも病んでしまう
MsgEn:
If the core tree falls ill, the dragons and the
earth will also suffer. Even humans, and the
monsters, will fall ill!

MsgJp: そう――全ては巡る竜力で繋がっているのだ
MsgEn:
That's right—Everything is connected by the power
of the dragons.

MsgJp:
今にして思えばとても奇妙に思えるのだ
なぜ魔物と戦うように、病魔や厄災と
戦おうとしなかったのか――
MsgEn:
Thinking about it now, it seems very strange.
Why didn't I try to fight against sickness and
disaster,
just as I would fight against enemies?

MsgJp:
フィンダムはもうずいぶん犠牲を払ったはずだが――
まだまだ足りないのだろうか
MsgEn:
Phindym must have sacrificed a lot already -
Is it still not enough?

MsgJp:
あの黒騎士が、どこから来たのか――
この凶事は黒騎士の仕業なのだろうか――
MsgEn:
Where did that black knight come from—Is the
black knight responsible for this evil?

MsgJp:
黒騎士が凶事に便乗したのか――
して、その目的は？　わからぬことばかりだ
MsgEn:
Did the Black Knight take advantage of the
calamity? And what is their goal? I can't
understand anything.

MsgJp:
――セシリーは良い子だろう？
わたしの自慢の娘だ
MsgEn:
--Isn't Cecily a good girl?
I'm very proud of her.

MsgJp: それなのに、途方もない重荷を負わせてしまったな
MsgEn:
And yet, I ended up burdening you with an
enormous load.

MsgJp:
不思議なものだ
この、病み、淀んだ空気にも馴れてしまうものだな
MsgEn:
It's strange. You become accustomed even to this
sickly, stagnant atmosphere.

MsgJp:
精霊竜ウィルミアは美しく愛らしい竜だ
今でも目を閉じると、優雅に飛ぶ姿が目に浮かぶ
MsgEn:
The spirit dragon Willmia is a beautiful and
lovely dragon. Even now, when I close my eyes, I
can see its graceful flying figure.

MsgJp: レスタニアの人よ、なんなりと
MsgEn: Lestania's people, anything you want.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
心苦しい限りだが、このフィンダム
まだまだ安定への道半ば――
MsgEn:
Arisen of Lestania, As much as it pains me, this
is a Phindym Still halfway on the path to
stability...

MsgJp: 最後まで、我々とともに歩んでくれ
MsgEn: Please continue to walk with us, until the end

MsgJp: 《原始の雫》とセシリーを頼んだよ
MsgEn: Rely on the "Primeval Drops" and Cecily.

MsgJp:
樹内への侵入者という意味では
我々も、魔物もそれほど違わない
もし、ウィルミアに攻撃されたら――
そうだな、全力で逃げるのが得策だろう
MsgEn:
In terms of intruders into the forest, both us
and the enemy are not much different. If we are
attacked by Willmia-- Yeah, it would be best to
escape with all our strength.

MsgJp:
浄化はすでに始まっているのだが――
想像以上に時間がかかるようだ
MsgEn:
The purification has already begun - but it seems
to be taking longer than anticipated.

MsgJp:
もう何もいうまい
これはさだめだ
抗うことを許されない種類のさだめもある
MsgEn:
I have nothing more to say.
This is fate.
There are types of fate that are not allowed to
be resisted.

MsgJp:
今はただ待とう――
娘はまた帰ってくる
MsgEn:
I will simply wait for now; my daughter will come
home again.

MsgJp: 竜として生まれ変わってな
MsgEn: To be reborn as a dragon.

MsgJp: さあ、早く為すべき事を！
MsgEn: Now, quickly do what needs to be done!

MsgJp:
我々はずっとここにいるし、あなたたちの
応援をしているよ
MsgEn: We'll be here all the way, supporting you!

MsgJp: 話すことなどない
MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.

MsgJp: 身の程を知れ
MsgEn: Know your place.

MsgJp: 聞く耳持たぬわ
MsgEn: I refuse to listen to you.

MsgJp: 消えろ
MsgEn: Disappear.

MsgJp: 笑止――
MsgEn: Ridiculous...

MsgJp: 耳障りな声だ
MsgEn: Such an annoying voice.

MsgJp: 思い上がるな
MsgEn: Don't get conceited.

MsgJp: 自惚れるな
MsgEn: Don't be conceited.

MsgJp: 半端覚者め――失せろ
MsgEn: You half-baked Arisen—Disappear.

MsgJp: 貴様らの世界観で我が遠謀深慮ははかれぬ
MsgEn: Our cunning cannot be understood by your worldview
